  6987                                  
  6988                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  6989                                  ;
  6990                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  6991                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  6992                                  ;
  6993                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  6994                                  ;
  6995                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  6996                                  ;   initialize it.
  6997                                  ;
  6998                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  6999                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7000                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7001                                  ;
  7002                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7003                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7004                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7005                                  ;
  7006                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7007                                  ;   save coding.
  7008                                  ;
  7009                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7010                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7011                                  ;
  7012                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7013                                  ;
  7014                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7015                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7016                                  ;
  7017                                  ; called modules:
  7018                                  ;		  getboot
  7019                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7020                                  ;
  7021                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7022                                  ;
  7023                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7024                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7025                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7026                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7027                                  ;
  7028                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7029                                  
  7030                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7031                                  domini:	
  7032 00002179 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7033                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7034 0000217D 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7035                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7036 0000217F 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7037 00002181 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7038                                  domini_loop:				
  7039 00002183 52                      		push	dx
  7040 00002184 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7041 00002188 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7042 0000218A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7043                                  					; DL = drive number
  7044                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7045                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7046                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7047 0000218C FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7048 0000218E 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7049 00002190 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7050 00002192 A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7051 00002195 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7052 00002198 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7053 0000219A A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7054 0000219D 06                      		push	es
  7055 0000219E 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7056 000021A2 E836FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7057                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7058 000021A5 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7059 000021A7 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7060                                  domininext:				
  7061 000021AA 07                      		pop	es
  7062 000021AB 5A                      		pop	dx
  7063 000021AC FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7064 000021AE FECE                    		dec	dh
  7065 000021B0 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7066                                  dominiret:				
  7067 000021B2 C3                      		retn
  7068                                  
  7069                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7070                                  
  7071                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7072                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7073                                  
  7074                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7075                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7076                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7077                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7078                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7079                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7080                                  ;
  7081                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7082                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7083                                  
  7084                                  
  7085                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7086 000021B3 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7087                                  fmpnext:				
  7088 000021B7 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7089 000021BB 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7090 000021BD 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7091 000021C0 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7092 000021C4 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7093                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7094                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7095                                  fmpnextfound:
  7096 000021C6 C3                      		retn
  7097                                  
  7098                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7099                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7100                                  ;fmpret:
  7101                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7102                                  
  7103                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7104                                  
  7105                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7106                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7107 000021C7 E8A100                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7108 000021CA 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7109 000021CC 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7110 000021D0 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7111                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7112 000021D5 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7113                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7114                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7115 000021D9 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7116                                  					; ffHardFile
  7117 000021DD C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7118 000021E2 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7119 000021E5 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7120 000021E8 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7121 000021EB 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7122 000021EE A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7123 000021F1 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7124                                  					; set physical number
  7125 000021F4 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7126 000021F7 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7127                                  					; set logical number
  7128 000021FA 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7129 000021FF 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7130 00002201 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7131                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7132 00002206 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7133                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7134                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7135 00002208 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7136 0000220B 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7137 0000220F 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7138 00002212 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7139 00002214 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7140 00002216 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7141 0000221A 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7142                                  					; set hidden trks
  7143 0000221D 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7144 00002221 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7145 00002225 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7146 00002229 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7147 0000222C B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7148 0000222F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7149                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7150                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7151                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7152 00002231 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7153 00002233 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7154 00002236 06                      		push	es
  7155 00002237 E80900                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7156                                  					; bx value saved.
  7157 0000223A 07                      		pop	es
  7158 0000223B 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7159 0000223D E84000                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7160                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7161 00002240 E974FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7162                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7163                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7164                                  
  7165                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7166                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7167                                  		;retn
  7168                                  
  7169                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7170                                  
  7171                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7172                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7173                                  
  7174                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7175                                  	
  7176 00002243 57                      		push	di
  7177 00002244 53                      		push	bx
  7178 00002245 1E                      		push	ds
  7179 00002246 06                      		push	es
  7180                                  setmini_1:				
  7181 00002247 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7182 0000224B 741B                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7183 0000224D 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7184 00002251 7415                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7185 00002253 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7186 00002257 740F                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7187 00002259 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7188 0000225C 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7189 00002260 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7190 00002262 F9                      		stc
  7191 00002263 07                      		pop	es
  7192 00002264 1F                      		pop	ds
  7193 00002265 5B                      		pop	bx
  7194 00002266 5F                      		pop	di
  7195 00002267 C3                      		retn
  7196                                  
  7197                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7198                                  setmini_2:				
  7199 00002268 E91DFB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7200                                  
  7201                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7202                                  
  7203                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7204                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7205                                  ;
  7206                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7207                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7208                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7209                                  ;
  7210                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7211                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7212                                  ;			trash ax
  7213                                  
  7214                                  dmax_check:	
  7215 0000226B 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7216 00002270 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7217 00002272 06                      		push	es
  7218                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7219 00002273 B85804                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7220 00002276 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7221                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7222 00002278 26C606[FF03]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7223                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7224                                  					; set message flag
  7225                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7226 0000227E 07                      		pop	es
  7227                                  
  7228                                  		;;push	es
  7229                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7230                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7231                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7232                                  					; set message flag
  7233                                  		;;pop	es
  7234                                  		;
  7235                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7236                                  dmax_ok:				
  7237 0000227F C3                      		retn
  7238                                  
  7239                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7240                                  
  7241                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7242                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7243                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7244                                  ;								 
  7245                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7246                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7247                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7248                                  
  7249                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7250 00002280 56                      		push	si
  7251 00002281 53                      		push	bx
  7252 00002282 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7253                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7254 00002286 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7255 00002289 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7256                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7257 0000228B 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7258 0000228D EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7259                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7260                                  
  7261                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7262                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7263 0000228F 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7264                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7265 00002291 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7266                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7267 00002294 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7268                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7269 00002298 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7270                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7271                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7272 0000229B 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7273 0000229E 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7274 000022A2 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7275 000022A4 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7276 000022A9 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7277 000022AD 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7278 000022B2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7279 000022B3 5E                      		pop	si
  7280 000022B4 C3                      		retn
  7281                                  
  7282                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7283                                  
  7284                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7285                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7286                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7287                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7288                                  
  7289                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7290 000022B5 50                      		push	ax
  7291 000022B6 51                      		push	cx
  7292 000022B7 52                      		push	dx
  7293 000022B8 55                      		push	bp
  7294 000022B9 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7295                                  loop_clock:				
  7296 000022BB 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7297 000022BD 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7298 000022BF B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7299 000022C1 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7300                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7301                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7302                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7303 000022C3 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7304 000022C6 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7305 000022C8 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7306 000022CB 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7307 000022CD 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7308 000022D0 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7309 000022D2 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7310 000022D3 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7311                                  delay:					
  7312 000022D6 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7313 000022D8 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7314                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7315                                  
  7316                                  clock_present:				
  7317 000022DA 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7318 000022E0 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7319                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7320                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7321 000022E3 56                      		push	si
  7322 000022E4 E842F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7323 000022E7 FA                      		cli
  7324                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7325 000022E8 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7326 000022EC FB                      		sti
  7327 000022ED 5E                      		pop	si
  7328                                  
  7329                                  no_readdate:				
  7330 000022EE 5D                      		pop	bp
  7331 000022EF 5A                      		pop	dx
  7332 000022F0 59                      		pop	cx
  7333 000022F1 58                      		pop	ax
  7334 000022F2 C3                      		retn
  7335                                  
  7336                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7337                                  
  7338                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7339                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7340                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7341                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7342                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7343                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7344                                  ;
  7345                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7346                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7347                                  ;
  7348                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7349                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7350                                  ;
  7351                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7352                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7353                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7354                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7355                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7356                                  ;
  7357                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7358                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7359                                  
  7360                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7361                                  
  7362                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7363                                  
  7364                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7365                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7366                                  			
  7367 000022F3 50                      		push	ax
  7368 000022F4 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7369 000022FA 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7370 000022FC 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7371                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7372 00002302 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7373 00002304 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7374                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7375 0000230A 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7376                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7377                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7378                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7379                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7380                                  cmosck4:				
  7381 0000230C B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7382                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7383 0000230E B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7384                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7385 00002310 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7386 00002313 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7387                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7388 00002315 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7389 00002318 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7390                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7391 0000231A 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7392 0000231C B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7393                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7394 0000231E E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7395                                  cmosck9:				
  7396 00002321 58                      		pop	ax
  7397 00002322 C3                      		retn
  7398                                  
  7399                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7400                                  
  7401                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7402                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7403                                  ;									       :
  7404                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7405                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7406                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7407                                  ;									       :
  7408                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7409                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7410                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7411                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7412                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7413                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7414                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7415                                  
  7416                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7417 00002323 9C                      		pushf
  7418 00002324 FA                      		cli
  7419 00002325 53                      		push	bx
  7420 00002326 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7421 00002327 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7422 00002329 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7423                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7424 0000232B 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7425 0000232C E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7426 0000232E 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7427 00002330 58                      		pop	ax
  7428 00002331 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7429 00002333 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7430 00002335 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7431                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7432 00002337 90                      		nop
  7433 00002338 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7434 0000233A 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7435 0000233C 5B                      		pop	bx
  7436 0000233D 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7437 0000233E E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7438 00002341 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7439                                  
  7440                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7441                                  
  7442                                  cmos_popf:				
  7443 00002342 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7444                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7445                                  
  7446                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7447                                  
  7448                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7449                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7450                                  ;									       :
  7451                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7452                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7453                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7454                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7455                                  ;									       :
  7456                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7457                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7458                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7459                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7460                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7461                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7462                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7463                                  
  7464                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7465 00002343 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7466 00002344 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7467 00002345 FA                      		cli
  7468 00002346 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7469 00002347 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7470 00002349 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7471                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7472 0000234B 90                      		nop
  7473 0000234C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7474 0000234E E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7475 00002350 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7476 00002351 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7477 00002353 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7478 00002355 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7479                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7480 00002357 90                      		nop
  7481 00002358 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7482 0000235A 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7483 0000235B 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7484 0000235C E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7485 0000235F C3                      		retn
  7486                                  
  7487                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7488                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7489                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7490                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7491                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7492                                  
  7493                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7494                                  ;
  7495                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7496                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7497                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7498                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7499                                  
  7500                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7501                                  
  7502                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7503                                  ;
  7504                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7505                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7506                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7507                                  
  7508                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7509                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7510                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7511                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7512                                  
  7513                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7514                                  getclus:				
  7515 00002360 51                      		push	cx
  7516 00002361 57                      		push	di
  7517 00002362 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7518 00002367 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7519 00002369 48                      		dec	ax
  7520 0000236A 48                      		dec	ax
  7521 0000236B F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7522                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7523                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7524 0000236D 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7525 00002372 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7526                                  unpack:					
  7527 00002377 1E                      		push	ds
  7528 00002378 50                      		push	ax
  7529 00002379 53                      		push	bx
  7530 0000237A 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7531 0000237F 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7532 00002381 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7533 00002383 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7534                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7535 00002389 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7536 0000238B D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7537                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7538 0000238D 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7539                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7540 0000238F 52                      		push	dx
  7541 00002390 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7542 00002392 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7543 00002395 5A                      		pop	dx
  7544 00002396 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7545 00002398 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7546                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7547                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7548 0000239A 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7549 0000239E 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7550 0000239F 52                      		push	dx
  7551 000023A0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7552 000023A2 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7553 000023A5 5A                      		pop	dx
  7554                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7555 000023A6 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7556 000023A9 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7557 000023AD 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7558                                  even_odd:				
  7559 000023B1 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7560 000023B2 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7561 000023B3 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7562 000023B5 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7563 000023B7 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7564                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7565 000023B9 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7566 000023BB D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7567 000023BD D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7568                                  havclus:				
  7569 000023BF 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7570 000023C1 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7571 000023C5 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7572                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7573                                  
  7574                                  unpack16:				
  7575 000023C7 52                      		push	dx
  7576 000023C8 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7577 000023CA D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7578 000023CC 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7579 000023CF E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7580 000023D2 5A                      		pop	dx
  7581 000023D3 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7582                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7583                                  unpackx:				
  7584 000023D5 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7585 000023D6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7586 000023D7 1F                      		pop	ds
  7587 000023D8 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7588 000023DA 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7589 000023DD 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7590 000023DF 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7591 000023E4 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7592                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7593                                  
  7594                                  getcl2:					
  7595 000023E6 53                      		push	bx
  7596 000023E7 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7597 000023E8 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7598 000023E9 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7599 000023ED 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7600 000023F2 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7601 000023F3 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7602                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7603 000023F8 1E                      		push	ds
  7604 000023F9 0E                      		push	cs
  7605 000023FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  7606 000023FB 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7607                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7608 000023FC BD[C508]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7609                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7610                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7611 000023FF E863F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7612 00002402 1F                      		pop	ds
  7613 00002403 5B                      		pop	bx
  7614 00002404 5F                      		pop	di
  7615 00002405 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7616 00002409 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7617 0000240B D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7618 0000240D 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7619 0000240F 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7620 00002410 C3                      		retn
  7621                                  
  7622                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7623                                  
  7624                                  
  7625                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7626                                  ;
  7627                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7628                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7629                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7630                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7631                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7632                                  ;
  7633                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7634                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7635                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7636                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7637                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7638                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7639                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7640                                  
  7641                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7642                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7643 00002411 50                      		push	ax
  7644 00002412 51                      		push	cx
  7645 00002413 57                      		push	di
  7646 00002414 56                      		push	si
  7647 00002415 06                      		push	es
  7648 00002416 1E                      		push	ds
  7649 00002417 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7650 00002419 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7651 0000241E F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7652 00002420 90                      		nop
  7653                                  
  7654                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7655                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7656                                  
  7657 00002421 06                      		push	es
  7658 00002422 1E                      		push	ds
  7659 00002423 57                      		push	di
  7660 00002424 50                      		push	ax
  7661 00002425 0E                      		push	cs
  7662 00002426 1F                      		pop	ds
  7663                                  
  7664 00002427 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7665 0000242B BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7666                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7667                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7668 0000242E 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7669 0000242F E833F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7670 00002432 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7671 00002433 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7672                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7673 00002437 5F                      		pop	di
  7674 00002438 1F                      		pop	ds
  7675 00002439 07                      		pop	es
  7676 0000243A 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7677 0000243F 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7678 00002441 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7679                                  					; sector number
  7680                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7681 00002445 52                      		push	dx
  7682 00002446 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7683                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7684                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7685 0000244D 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7686 0000244F B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7687 00002452 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7688 00002456 1E                      		push	ds
  7689 00002457 07                      		pop	es
  7690 00002458 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7691 0000245A 1E                      		push	ds
  7692 0000245B 0E                      		push	cs
  7693 0000245C 1F                      		pop	ds
  7694 0000245D 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7695 0000245E BD[C508]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7696                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7697                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7698 00002461 E801F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7699 00002464 1F                      		pop	ds
  7700 00002465 5A                      		pop	dx
  7701 00002466 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7702                                  
  7703                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7704 0000246B 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7705 0000246C 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7706                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7707                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7708 0000246E 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7709 00002470 1F                      		pop	ds
  7710 00002471 07                      		pop	es
  7711 00002472 5E                      		pop	si
  7712 00002473 5F                      		pop	di
  7713 00002474 59                      		pop	cx
  7714 00002475 58                      		pop	ax
  7715 00002476 C3                      		retn
  7716                                  
  7717                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7718                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7719                                  
  7720                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7721                                  
  7722                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7723                                  		;db 0
  7724                                  
  7725                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7726                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7727                                  
  7728                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7729 00002477 00<rep 9h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7730                                  %endif
  7731                                  
  7732                                  ;align 16
  7733                                  
  7734                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7735                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7736                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7737                                  
  7738                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  7739                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7740                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7741                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7742                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  7743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7744                                  
  7745                                  ;============================================================================
  7746                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7747                                  ;============================================================================
  7748                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7749                                  
  7750                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7751                                  
  7752                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7753                                   
  7754                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7755                                  
  7756                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7757                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7758                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7759                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7760                                  
  7761                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7762 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7763 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7764                                  
  7765                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7766                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7767                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7768                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7769                                  
  7770                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7771                                  
  7772                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7773                                  
  7774                                  ;************************************************************************
  7775                                  ;*									*
  7776                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7777                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7778                                  ;*									*
  7779                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7780                                  ;*									*
  7781                                  ;************************************************************************
  7782                                  
  7783                                  _seg_reinit:
  7784 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7785                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7786                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7787 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7788 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7789                                  
  7790                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7791 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7792 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7793 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7794 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7795 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7796                                  
  7797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7798                                  
  7799                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7800                                  
  7801                                  ;************************************************************************
  7802                                  ;*									*
  7803                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7804                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7805                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7806                                  ;*									*
  7807                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7808                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7809                                  ;*									*
  7810                                  ;************************************************************************
  7811                                  
  7812                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7813 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7814 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7815 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7816 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7817 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7818 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7819 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7820 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7821 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7822 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7823 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7824                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7825                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7826 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7827 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7828 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7829 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7830 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7831 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7832 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7833 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7834 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7835 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7836                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7837 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7838                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7839                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7840 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7841                                  
  7842                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7843                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7844                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7845                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7846                                  ;
  7847                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7848                                  ;
  7849                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7850                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7851                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7852                                  ;
  7853                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7854                                  
  7855                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7856 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7857 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7858 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7859 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7860                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7861                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7862 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7863 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7864                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7865                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7866 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7867 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7868 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7869 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7870 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7871 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7872 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7873 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7874 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7875 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  7876                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7877 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7878                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7879 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7880 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7881                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7882                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  7883                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7884                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7885 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7886                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7887 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7888 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7889                                  					; mark operation complete
  7890 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  7891 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  7892 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7893 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  7894 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  7895 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  7896 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  7897 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  7898 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  7899 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  7900                                  	
  7901                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  7902                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  7903                                  bc_retf:
  7904 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  7905                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7906                                  
  7907                                  command_error:				
  7908 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  7909 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  7910                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7911                                  ; 01/05/2019
  7912                                  
  7913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7914                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  7915                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  7916                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  7917                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  7918                                  ; high.
  7919                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7920                                  
  7921                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  7922                                  
  7923                                  		; 15/10/2022
  7924                                  
  7925 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  7926                                  
  7927 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  7928                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  7929                                  		
  7930                                  
  7931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7932                                  
  7933                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  7934                                  
  7935                                  bc_cmderr:				
  7936 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7937                                  					; unknown command error
  7938                                  
  7939                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7940                                  
  7941                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  7942                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  7943                                  
  7944                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  7945                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  7946                                  
  7947                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  7948                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7949                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7950 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7951 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  7952                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  7953 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  7954 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  7955 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  7956                                  
  7957                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7958                                  
  7959                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  7960                                  
  7961                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7962                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  7963                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7964                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7965                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7966                                  
  7967                                  ; 30/04/2019
  7968                                  
  7969                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7970                                  
  7971                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7972                                  
  7973                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  7974                                  
  7975                                  ;************************************************************************
  7976                                  ;*									*
  7977                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  7978                                  ;*									*
  7979                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  7980                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  7981                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  7982                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  7983                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  7984                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  7985                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  7986                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  7987                                  ;*									*
  7988                                  ;************************************************************************
  7989                                  
  7990                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7991                                  		;db 0
  7992                                  
  7993                                  		; 13/12/202
  7994 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  7995                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  7996 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  7997                                  					; 00 init
  7998 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  7999 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8000 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8001                                  					; 03
  8002 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8003                                  					; 04
  8004 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8005                                  					; 05
  8006 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8007 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8008                                  					; 07
  8009 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8010                                  					; 08
  8011 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8012 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8013                                  con_table_end:
  8014 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8015                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8016 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8017 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8018 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8019 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8020 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8021                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8022 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8023                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8024 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8025 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8026 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8027 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8028 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8029 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8030 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8031 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8032 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8033 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8034 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8035 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8036 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8037 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8038 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8039 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8040 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8041 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8042 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8043 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8044                                  prn_table_end:
  8045 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8046                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8047 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8048 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8049 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8050 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8051 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8052 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8053 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8054 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8055 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8056 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8057 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8058                                  aux_table_end:
  8059 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8060                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8061 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8062 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
