  8066 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8067 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8068 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8069 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8070 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8071                                  tim_table_end:
  8072                                  
  8073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8074                                  
  8075                                  ;************************************************************************
  8076                                  ;*									*
  8077                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8078                                  ;*									*
  8079                                  ;************************************************************************
  8080                                  
  8081                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8082                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8083 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8084                                  con_loop:				
  8085 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8086 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8087 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8088                                  con_exit:				
  8089 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8090 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8091                                  
  8092                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8093                                  
  8094                                  ;************************************************************************
  8095                                  ;*									*
  8096                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8097                                  ;*									*
  8098                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8099                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8100                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8101                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8102                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8103                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8104                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8105                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8106                                  ;*									*
  8107                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8108                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8109                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8110                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8111                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8112                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8113                                  ;*									*
  8114                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8115                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8116                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8117                                  ;*									*
  8118                                  ;************************************************************************
  8119                                  
  8120                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8121                                  chrin:		
  8122 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8123 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8124 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8125 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8126 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8127 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8128 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8129 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8130 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8131 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8132 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8133 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8134                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8135                                  
  8136                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8137                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8138                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8139                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8140                                  ;      else
  8141                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8142                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8143                                  ;      endif
  8144                                  ;    endif
  8145                                  ;  endif
  8146                                  
  8147                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8148 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8149 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8150 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8151 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8152 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8153 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8154 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8155 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8157                                  
  8158                                  not_ext:				
  8159 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8160 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8161                                  alt_save:				
  8162 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8163                                  keyret:					
  8164 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8165                                  
  8166                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8167                                  
  8168                                  ;************************************************************************
  8169                                  ;*									*
  8170                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8171                                  ;*									*
  8172                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8173                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8174                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8175                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8176                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8177                                  ;*									*
  8178                                  ;************************************************************************
  8179                                  
  8180                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8181                                  con_rdnd:				
  8182 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8183 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8184 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8185 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8186 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8187 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8188 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8189 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8190 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8191                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8192 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8193                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8194 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8195 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8196 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8197 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8198                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8199                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8200                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8201                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8202 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8203 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8204 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8205                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8206                                  
  8207                                  gotchr:					
  8208 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8209 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8210 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8211 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8212 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8213                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8214                                  
  8215                                  notbrk:					
  8216 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8217 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8218 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8219 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8220                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8221                                  
  8222                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8223 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8224 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8225 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8226 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8227 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8228 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8229 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8230                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8231                                  rdexit:					
  8232 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8233 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8234                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8235                                  bc_exvec:				
  8236 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8237                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8238 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8239                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8240                                  
  8241                                  ;************************************************************************
  8242                                  ;*									*
  8243                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8244                                  ;*									*
  8245                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8246                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8247                                  ;*									*
  8248                                  ;************************************************************************
  8249                                  
  8250                                  con_writ:
  8251                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8252 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8253                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8254                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8255                                  con_lp:					
  8256 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8257 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8258 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8259                                  					; AL = character to display
  8260 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8261                                  cc_ret:					
  8262 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8263 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8264                                  
  8265                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8266                                  
  8267                                  ;************************************************************************
  8268                                  ;*									*
  8269                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8270                                  ;*									*
  8271                                  ;************************************************************************
  8272                                  
  8273                                  con_flush:
  8274 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8275                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8276 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8277 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8278                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8279                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8280                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8281 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8282 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8283 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8284                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8285 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8286                                  
  8287                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8288                                  
  8289                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8290                                  
  8291                                  ;************************************************************************
  8292                                  ;*									*
  8293                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8294                                  ;*									*
  8295                                  ;************************************************************************
  8296                                  
  8297                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8298                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8299                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8300                                  
  8301                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8302                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8303                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8304                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8305                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8306                                  ;
  8307                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8308                                  
  8309                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8310                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8311                                  
  8312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8313                                  
  8314                                  ;************************************************************************
  8315                                  ;*									*
  8316                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8317                                  ;*									*
  8318                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8319                                  ;*									*
  8320                                  ;************************************************************************
  8321                                  
  8322                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8323 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8324                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8325                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8326                                  prn_done:
  8327 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8328 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8329                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8330                                  
  8331                                  ;************************************************************************
  8332                                  ;*									*
  8333                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8334                                  ;*									*
  8335                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8336                                  ;*									*
  8337                                  ;************************************************************************
  8338                                  
  8339                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8340                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8341 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8342                                  prn_loop:				
  8343 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8344                                  prn_out:				
  8345 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8346 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8347 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8348 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8349 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8350 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8351 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8352 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8353 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8354 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8355 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8356                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8357                                  
  8358                                  _prnwf:					
  8359 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8360 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8361                                  TestPrnError:				
  8362 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8363 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8364                                  pmessg:					
  8365 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8366                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8367                                  
  8368                                  prn_con:				
  8369 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8370 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8371                                  ;prn_done:				
  8372                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8373                                  prn_done2:
  8374                                  		;clc
  8375                                  		; cf=0
  8376 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8378                                  
  8379                                  ;************************************************************************
  8380                                  ;*									*
  8381                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8382                                  ;*									*
  8383                                  ;************************************************************************
  8384                                  
  8385                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8386 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8387 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8388 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8389                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8390                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8391 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8392 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8393                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8394                                  
  8395                                  ;************************************************************************
  8396                                  ;*									*
  8397                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8398                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8399                                  ;*									*
  8400                                  ;************************************************************************
  8401                                  
  8402                                  prnstat:				
  8403 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8404                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8405                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8406                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8407                                  
  8408                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8409                                  
  8410                                  ;************************************************************************
  8411                                  ;*									*
  8412                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8413                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8414                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8415                                  ;*									*
  8416                                  ;************************************************************************
  8417                                  
  8418                                  prnop:	
  8419 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8420 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8421                                  
  8422                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8423                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8424                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8425                                  
  8426 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8427 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8428 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8429 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8430 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8431 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8432 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8433                                  
  8434                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8435                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8436                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8437                                  
  8438                                  NextTest:				
  8439 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8440                                  					; i/o error?
  8441 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8442                                  
  8443                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8444                                  
  8445 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8446                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8447 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8448 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8449 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8450                                  ret1:					
  8451 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8452                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8453                                  
  8454                                  checknotready:				
  8455 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8456 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8457 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8458                                  
  8459                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8460                                  
  8461                                  ;************************************************************************
  8462                                  ;*									*
  8463                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8464                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8465                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8466                                  ;*									*
  8467                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8468                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8469                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8470                                  ;*									*
  8471                                  ;************************************************************************
  8472                                  
  8473                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8474                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8475 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8476                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8477 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8478 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8479 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8480 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8481 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8482                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8483 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8484 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8485                                  prn_getstat:				
  8486 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8487 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8488 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8489 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8490 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8491 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8492 000002A6 26                      		es
  8493 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8494                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8495                                  					; lodsb
  8496 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8497 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8498 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8499 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8500                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8501                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8502                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8503 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8504

  8506

  8509                                  prn_berr:				
  8510 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  8526                                  ;********************************;*

  8553 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]

  8606                                  ;************************************************************************
  8607                                  ;*									*
  8608                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8609                                  ;*									*
  8610                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8611                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8612                                  ;*									*

  8614                                  
  8615                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8616                                  
  8617                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8618                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8619                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8620                                  
  8621                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8622                                  
  8623                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8624                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8625                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8626                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8627                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8628                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8629                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout

  8631                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8632                                  
  8633                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8634                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8635                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect

  8638                                  
  8639                                  ;************************************************************************
  8640                                  ;*									*
  8641                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8642                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8643                                  ;*									*
  8644                                  ;************************************************************************

  8646                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh

  8649 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8650 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8651 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8652 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8653 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8654                                  aux1:					
  8655 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8656                                  					; won't return if error
  8657                                  aux2:

  8662                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022

  8666                                  ;************************************************************************
  8667                                  ;*									*
  8668                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8669                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8670                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8671                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8672                                  ;*									*
  8673                                  ;************************************************************************
  8674                                  
  8675                                  auxin:

  8679                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8680                                  		;retn
  8681                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8682 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8684                                  
  8685                                  arbad:

  8687 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8688 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8689 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8690                                  
  8691                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8692                                  
  8693                                  ;************************************************************************
  8694                                  ;*									*
  8695                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8696                                  ;*									*
  8697                                  ;************************************************************************
  8698                                  
  8699                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h

  8703 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8704 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device

  8706 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8707 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8708 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8709 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8710 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8711                                  auxdrx:					
  8712 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status

  8728 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8729 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8730 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8731                                  		; 12/12/2022

  8733                                  		;clc
  8734 00000359 C3                      		retn

  8737                                  ;************************************************************************
  8738                                  ;*									*
  8739                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8740                                  ;*									*
  8741                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8742                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8743                                  ;*									*
  8744                                  ;************************************************************************
  8745                                  
  8746                                  auxstat:				
  8747 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8748                                  
  8749                                  		; fall into auxop
  8750                                  
  8751                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8752                                  
  8753                                  ;************************************************************************
  8754                                  ;*									*
  8755                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8756                                  ;*									*
  8757                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8758                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8759                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8760                                  ;*									*
  8761                                  ;************************************************************************

  8763                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8764 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8765                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8766                                  					; get port number
  8767 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8768                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8769                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8770 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8771                                  
  8772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8773                                  
  8774                                  ;************************************************************************
  8775                                  ;*									*
  8776                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8777                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8778                                  ;*									*
  8779                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8780                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8781                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8782                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8783                                  ;*									*
  8784                                  ;************************************************************************
  8785                                  
  8786                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8787 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8788 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8789                                  					; zero out buffer
  8790                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8791                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8792                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8793 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8794                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8795                                  
  8796                                  ;************************************************************************
  8797                                  ;*									*
  8798                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8799                                  ;*									*
  8800                                  ;************************************************************************
  8801                                  
  8802                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8803                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8804 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8805                                  aux_loop:				
  8806 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8807                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8808 0000036F 47                      		inc	di

  8810 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8811 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8812 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error

  8814 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8815                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8816                                  
  8817                                  awok:					
  8818 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8819                                  					; still	more character to print
  8820                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8821                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8822                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8823 00000381 C3                      		retn

  8825                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8826

  8831                                  ;*									*

  8834                                  getbx:

  8836                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])

  8838 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  8839                                  		; 12/12/2022

  8841 0000038A C3                      		retn

  8845                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8846                                  
  8847                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8848                                  ;								:
  8849                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8850                                  ;								:
  8851                                  ;								:
  8852                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8853                                  ;								:
  8854                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8855                                  ;								:
  8856                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8857                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8858                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8859                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8860                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8861                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8862                                  ;								:
  8863                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8864                                  ;								:
  8865                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8866                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8867                                  ;								:
  8868                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8869                                  
  8870                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8871                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8872                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8873                                  
  8874                                  ;19/07/2019
  8875                                  ;09/03/2019
  8876                                  
  8877                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8878                                  
  8879                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8880                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8881                                  
  8882 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8883 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8884 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8885 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8886 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8887 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8888 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8889 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8890 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8891 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8892 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8893 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8894 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8895 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  8896 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8897                                  
  8898                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  8899                                  
  8900 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  8901 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  8902 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  8903 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  8904 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  8905 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  8906 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  8907 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  8908 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8909 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  8910 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  8911 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  8912 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  8913 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8914 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  8915 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  8916 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  8917 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  8918 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  8919 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  8920                                  
  8921                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8922                                  
  8923                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8924                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8925                                  
  8926                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8927                                  ;
  8928                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  8929                                  ;
  8930                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  8931                                  ;
  8932                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  8933                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  8934                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  8935                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  8936                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  8937                                  ;
  8938                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  8939                                  ;
  8940                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8941                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8942                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8943                                  ;
  8944                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8945                                  
  8946                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  8947 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  8948 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  8949                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  8950 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8951                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8952 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  8953 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  8954                                  					; get binary hours
  8955                                  					; convert to bcd
  8956 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8957                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  8958 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  8959 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  8960 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8961                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  8962 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  8963 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  8964 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8965                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  8966 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  8967 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  8968 000003FB FA                      		cli
  8969 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  8970 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8971                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  8972                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  8973                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8974 00000400 FB                      		sti
  8975                                  no_cmos_1:				
  8976 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  8977 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  8978                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8979 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  8980                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  8981                                  					; convert time to ticks
  8982                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  8983 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  8984 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8985 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  8986                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  8987                                  					; Return: time of day set
  8988                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  8989 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  8990 00000416 FB                      		sti
  8991                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8992 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8993 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  8994 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  8995                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  8996                                  					; convert to bcd format
  8997 00000422 FA                      		cli
  8998 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  8999 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  9000                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9001                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  9002                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  9003 00000427 FB                      		sti
  9004                                  no_cmos_2:
  9005                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9006                                  		; cf=0				
  9007                                  		;clc
  9008 00000428 C3                      		retn
  9009                                  
  9010                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9011                                  
  9012                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9013                                  
  9014                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9015                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  9016                                  ; and returns the following information:
  9017                                  ;
  9018                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  9019                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  9020                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  9021                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  9022                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  9023                                  ;
  9024                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9025                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9026                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9027                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9028                                  
  9029                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9030 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9031 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9032                                  
  9033                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9034                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9035                                  ;
  9036                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9037                                  ;	       ----------------
  9038                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9039                                  ;
  9040                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9041                                  ;
  9042                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9043                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9044                                  ;		1,193,180
  9045                                  ;
  9046                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9047                                  ;
  9048                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9049                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9050                                  ;		59,659
  9051                                  ;
  9052                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9053                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9054                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9055                                  ;
  9056                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9057                                  ; multiply by 5
  9058                                  
  9059 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9060 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9061                                  					; multiply by 5
  9062 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9063 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9064 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9065 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9066 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9067 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9068 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9069                                  
  9070                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9071                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9072                                  
  9073 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9074 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9075                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9076 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9077 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9078 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9079                                  
  9080                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9081                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9082                                  
  9083 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9084 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9085                                  
  9086                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9087                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9088                                  
  9089 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9090 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9091 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9092 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9093                                  noadj:					
  9094 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9095 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9096                                  
  9097                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9098                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9099                                  
  9100 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9101 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9102 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9103 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9104 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9105 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9106 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9107 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9108                                  
  9109                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9110                                  
  9111 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9112 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9113 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9114 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9115 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9116 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9117 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9118 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9119 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9120                                  
  9121                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9122                                  
  9123                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9124                                  
  9125                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9126                                  ;
  9127                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9128                                  ;
  9129                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9130                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9131                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9132                                  ;
  9133                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9134                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9135                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9136                                  ;			else
  9137                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9138                                  ;		}
  9139                                  ;
  9140                                  ; USES : AX
  9141                                  ;
  9142                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9143                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9144                                  ;
  9145                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9146                                  
  9147                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9148                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9149 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9150 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9151                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9152                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9153                                  					; midnight
  9154                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9155 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9156 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9157 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9158                                  					; and not flag
  9159 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9160 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9161                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9162                                  
  9163                                  inc_case:				
  9164 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9165 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9166 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9167                                  no_rollover:				
  9168 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9169

  9197                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9198                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9199                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9200                                  
  9201                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9202                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9203                                  
  9204                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9205                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9206                                  
  9207                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9208                                  
  9209                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9210                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9211                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9212                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9213                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9214                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9215                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9216                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9217                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9218                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9219                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9220                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9221                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9222                                  
  9223                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9224                                  
  9225                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9226                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9227                                  ;
  9228                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9229                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9230                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9231                                  ;   else
  9232                                  ;	set slow = value
  9233                                  ;   ...
  9234                                  ;*********************************************
  9235                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9236                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9237                                  ;*	 use slow
  9238                                  ;*   else
  9239                                  ;*	 use fast
  9240                                  ;*********************************************
  9241                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9242                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9243                                  ;	use slow
  9244                                  ;   else
  9245                                  ;	use fast
  9246                                  ;   ...
  9247                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9248                                  ;
  9249                                  ;
  9250                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9251                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9252                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9253                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9254                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9255                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9256                                  
  9257                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9258                                  
  9259                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9260                                  
  9261                                  ; BIOSCODE:04A2h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9262

  9264                                  ;	command jump table
  9265                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9266                                  
  9267 00000495 00                      		db 0
  9268                                  
  9269                                  ; 11/12/2022
  9270                                  %if 0
  9271                                  
  9272                                  dsktbl:		db 26			; 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  9273                                  					; ((dtbl_siz-1)/2) ; this is the size of the table ; 26
  9274                                  		dw 1742h		; dsk_init

  9281                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear

  9288                                  		dw 81Ah			; dsk_close

  9291                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear

  9306 00000497 [E916]                  		dw dsk_init

  9335                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9336                                  
  9337                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9338                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9339                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9340                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9341                                  ;
  9342                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9343                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9344                                  
  9345                                  SetDrive:	
  9346                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9347 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9348                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9349 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9350 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9351 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9352 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9353 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9354 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9355                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9356 000004DE C3                      		retn
  9357

  9359                                  
  9360                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9361                                  
  9362                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9363                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9364                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9365                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9366                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9367                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9368                                  
  9369                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
  9370 000004DF E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
  9371 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9372 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9373                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9374 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9375                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9376 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format

  9447                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9448                                  
  9449                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9450                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
  9451                                  ; drive.
  9452                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
  9453                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
  9454                                  ; returns in si:
  9455                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
  9456                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
  9457                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
  9458                                  ;
  9459                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
  9460                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9461                                  
  9462                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9463                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
  9464 00000553 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
  9465 00000556 E821FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
  9466 00000559 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
  9467                                  					; get stored time
  9468 0000055D 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
  9469 0000055F 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
  9470 00000563 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
  9471 00000565 751A                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
  9472 00000567 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
  9473 00000569 7511                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
  9474 0000056B FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
  9475 0000056F 803E[1D01]05            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
  9476                                  					; if count is less than threshold, ok
  9477 00000574 720C                    		jb	short timecheck_ret
  9478 00000576 FE0E[1D01]              		dec	byte [accesscount] ; don't let the count wrap
  9479 0000057A EB05                    		jmp	short timecheck_unk ; "i don't know" if media changed
  9480                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9481                                  
  9482                                  timepassed:				
  9483 0000057C 83FA24                  		cmp	dx, 36		; 18*2 ; 18.2 tics per second.
  9484                                  					; min elapsed time? (2 seconds)
  9485 0000057F 7601                    		jbe	short timecheck_ret ; yes, presume no change
  9486                                  
  9487                                  		; everything indicates that we do not know what has happened.
  9488                                  timecheck_unk:				
  9489 00000581 4E                      		dec	si		; presume i don't know
  9490                                  timecheck_ret:				
  9491 00000582 C3                      		retn
  9492                                  
  9493                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9494                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9495                                  Err_Exitj2:
  9496 00000583 EBC8                    		jmp	short err_exitj
