 12082                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12083                                  		;dec	al
 12084                                  		; 18/12/2022

 12086                                  		; al = 2
 12087                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12088                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12089                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12090                                  
 12091                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:

 12093                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12094                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12095 00001074 48                      		dec	ax

 12097                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12098                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12099                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12100                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 12120                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12121                                  
 12122                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12123                                  ;
 12124                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12125                                  ;
 12126                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12127                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12128                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12129                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12130                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12131                                  ;
 12132                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12133                                  
 12134                                  ResetDisk:	
 12135 0000107C 50                      		push	ax
 12136 0000107D 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12137                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12138 00001082 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12139                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12140 00001084 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12141                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12142 00001089 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12143 0000108B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12144                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12145 0000108D C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12146                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12147 00001092 58                      		pop	ax
 12148 00001093 C3                      		retn

 12150                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12151                                  
 12152                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12153                                  
 12154                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12155                                  ;
 12156                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12157                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12158                                  ;
 12159                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12160                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12161                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12162                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12163                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12164                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12165                                  ;
 12166                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12167                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12168                                  ;
 12169                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12170                                  
 12171                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12172                                  ToRom:	
 12173 00001094 53                      		push	bx
 12174 00001095 56                      		push	si
 12175                                  
 12176                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12177                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12178                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12179                                  
 12180 00001096 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12181 0000109B 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12182 0000109D 50                      		push	ax
 12183 0000109E 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12184 0000109F 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12185                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12186 000010A4 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12187 000010A5 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12188                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12189 000010A9 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12190                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12191                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12192 000010AE 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12193 000010B2 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12194                                  		
 12195 000010B6 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12196 000010B9 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12197 000010BD A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12198 000010C0 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12199                                  					; Important for	format
 12200 000010C4 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12201                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12202                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12203 000010C9 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12204 000010CA 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12205 000010CC 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12206                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12207 000010D1 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12208 000010D2 58                      		pop	ax
 12209                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12210 000010D3 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12211 000010D7 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12212 000010D9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12213 000010DD 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12214 000010E1 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12215 000010E2 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12216 000010E6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12217 000010E8 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12218 000010E9 5E                      		pop	si
 12219 000010EA 5B                      		pop	bx
 12220 000010EB C3                      		retn

 12223                                  
 12224                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12225                                  
 12226                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12227                                  
 12228                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12229                                  ;
 12230                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12231                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12232                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12233                                  ;
 12234                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12235                                  
 12236                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12237                                  ioctl_getown:
 12238 000010EC E8DCF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12239 000010EF 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12240                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12241 000010F3 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12242                                  ownloop:				
 12243 000010F7 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12244 000010FB 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12245                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12246 000010FD 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12247                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12248                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12249 00001102 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12250                                  getnextBDS:				
 12251 00001104 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12252 00001107 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12254                                  
 12255                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12256                                  ;
 12257                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12258                                  ; in al to al.
 12259                                  ;
 12260                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12261                                  
 12262                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12263                                  ioctl_setown:
 12264 00001109 E8BFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12265 0000110C C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12266                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12267 00001111 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12268 00001114 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12269                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12270                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12271                                  
 12272                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12273                                  ;
 12274                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12275                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12276                                  ;
 12277                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12278                                  
 12279                                  exitown:				
 12280 00001119 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12281                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12282 0000111B 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12283                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12284                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12285 00001120 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12286 00001122 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12287                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12288                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12289 00001126 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12290                                  exitnomult:				
 12291 00001128 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12292 0000112C 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12293                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12294                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12295                                  		; cf=0
 12296                                  		;clc
 12297 0000112F C3                      		retn

 12299                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12300                                  
 12301                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12302                                  
 12303                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12304                                  ;
 12305                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 12306                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 12307                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 12308                                  ;
 12309                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12310                                  
 12311                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12312                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 12313                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 12314                                  		; do not do it again.
 12315                                  	
 12316 00001130 50                      		push	ax
 12317 00001131 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 12318 00001133 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al	; Reset flag and 
 12319 00001136 8606[3806]              		xchg	al, [media_set_for_format] ; get current flag setting
 12320 0000113A 08C0                    		or	al, al
 12321 0000113C 741E                    		jz	short DontRestore
 12322 0000113E 56                      		push	si
 12323 0000113F 1E                      		push	ds
 12324 00001140 06                      		push	es
 12325 00001141 C536[3A06]              		lds	si, [tempdpt]
 12326                                  
 12327                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12328 00001145 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12329                                  		;mov	es, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12330 0000114A 268E06[1A00]            		mov	es, [es:zeroseg]
 12331                                  		;mov	es, es:zeroseg	; CAS -- bleeeech!
 12332                                  
 12333                                  		;mov	es:78h,	si	; [es:DSKADR]
 12334 0000114F 2689367800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], si
 12335                                  		;mov	word ptr es:7Ah, ds ; [es:DSKADR+2]
 12336 00001154 268C1E7A00              		mov	[es:DSKADR+2], ds
 12337 00001159 07                      		pop	es
 12338 0000115A 1F                      		pop	ds
 12339 0000115B 5E                      		pop	si
 12340                                  DontRestore:				
 12341 0000115C 58                      		pop	ax

 12344                                  		;clc			;  Clear carry

 12349                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12350                                  
 12351                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12352                                  ;	get media id
 12353                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12354                                  ;
 12355                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12356                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12357                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12358                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12359                                  ;
 12360                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12361                                  ;
 12362                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12363                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12364                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12365                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12366                                  ;
 12367                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12368                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12369                                  ;
 12370                                  ; LOGIC:
 12371                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12372                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12373                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12374                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12375                                  ;
 12376                                  ; {
 12377                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12378                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12379                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12380                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12381                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12382                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12383                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12384                                  ;		};
 12385                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12386                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12387                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12388                                  ;		};
 12389                                  ;	else
 12390                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12391                                  ;
 12392                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12393                                  
 12394                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12395                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12396                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12397                                  
 12398                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12399                                  GetMediaId:
 12400 0000115E E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12401 00001161 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12402 00001165 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12403 0000116A E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12404 0000116D 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12405                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12406 0000116F 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12407                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12408 00001174 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12409                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12410 00001176 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12411 00001179 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12412                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12413                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12414 0000117C 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12415 0000117E C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12416 00001182 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12417                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12418 00001186 46                      		inc	si
 12419                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12420                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12421 00001187 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12422 0000118A B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12423                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12424                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12425 0000118D F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12426                                  	
 12427                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12428                                  		; cf = 0
 12429                                  		;clc
 12430                                  
 12431 0000118F C3                      		retn
 12432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12433                                  
 12434                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12435 00001190 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12436 00001192 F9                      		stc
 12437                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12438 00001193 C3                      		retn
 12439                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12440                                  
 12441                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12442                                  
 12443                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12444                                  ;  set media id
 12445                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12446                                  
 12447                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12448                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12449                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12450                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12451                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12452                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12453                                  ;
 12454                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12455                                  ;
 12456                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12457                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12458                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12459                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12460                                  ;
 12461                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12462                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12463                                  ;
 12464                                  ; logic:
 12465                                  ;
 12466                                  ; {
 12467                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12468                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12469                                  ;	BootIo;
 12470                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12471                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12472                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12473                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12474                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12475                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12476                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12477                                  ;		};
 12478                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12479                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12480                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12481                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12482                                  ;		};
 12483                                  ;	else
 12484                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12485                                  ;
 12486                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12487                                  
 12488                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12489                                  SetMediaId:
 12490 00001194 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12491 00001197 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12492                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12493 0000119B 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12494 0000119D C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12495 000011A2 52                      		push	dx
 12496 000011A3 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12497 000011A6 5A                      		pop	dx
 12498 000011A7 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12499                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12500 000011A9 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12501                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12502 000011AE 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12503 000011B0 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12504                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12505 000011B5 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12506 000011B7 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12507 000011B8 57                      		push	di
 12508 000011B9 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12509 000011BA 07                      		pop	es
 12510 000011BB BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12511 000011BE C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12512 000011C2 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12513 000011C5 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12514 000011C8 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12515                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12516                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12517 000011CB F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12518 000011CD 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12519 000011CE 1F                      		pop	ds
 12520 000011CF 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12521 000011D0 07                      		pop	es
 12522 000011D1 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12523 000011D4 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12524 000011D6 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12525 000011DB E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12526 000011DE C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12527                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12528                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12529 000011E3 C3                      		retn
 12530                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12531                                  
 12532                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12533 000011E4 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12534 000011E6 F9                      		stc
 12535                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12536 000011E7 C3                      		retn
 12537                                  
 12538                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12539                                  
 12540                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12541                                  
 12542                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12543                                  ;	BootIo
 12544                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12545                                  ;
 12546                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12547                                  ;
 12548                                  ; input :
 12549                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12550                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12551                                  ;
 12552                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12553                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12554                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12555                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12556                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12557                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12558                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12559                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12560                                  ;
 12561                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12562                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12563                                  ;
 12564                                  ; logic:
 12565                                  ;
 12566                                  ; {
 12567                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12568                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12569                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12570                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12571                                  ; }
 12572                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12573                                  
 12574                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12575                                  BootIo:	
 12576 000011E8 06                      		push	es
 12577 000011E9 57                      		push	di
 12578 000011EA 53                      		push	bx
 12579 000011EB 1E                      		push	ds
 12580 000011EC 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12581                                  
 12582                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12583                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12584                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12585                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12586                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12587                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12588                                  
 12589 000011ED BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12590 000011F0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12591 000011F2 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12592 000011F6 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12593 000011F9 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12594 000011FC 5B                      		pop	bx
 12595 000011FD 5F                      		pop	di
 12596 000011FE 07                      		pop	es
 12597 000011FF C3                      		retn
 12598                                  
 12599                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12600                                  
 12601                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12602                                  
 12603                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12604                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12606                                  ;
 12607                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12608                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12609                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12610                                  ; history in the flags.
 12611                                  ;
 12612                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12613                                  ;
 12614                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12615                                  ;
 12616                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12617                                  ;
 12618                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12619                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12620                                  ;
 12621                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12622                                  
 12623                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12624 00001200 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12625 00001204 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12626 00001206 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12627                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12628 00001208 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12629                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12630                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12631 0000120D 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12632 0000120F 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12633 00001214 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12634 00001216 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12635 00001219 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12636                                  
 12637                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12638                                  
 12639 0000121B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12640 0000121D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12641                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12642                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12643 0000121F 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12644 00001221 53                      		push	bx
 12645 00001222 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12646                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12647                                  					; physical drive
 12648 00001225 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12649 00001228 5B                      		pop	bx
 12650                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12651 00001229 C3                      		retn
 12652

 12654

 12656                                  
 12657                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12658                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12659                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12660                                  ;
 12661                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12662                                  ;
 12663                                  ; INPUT :
 12664                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12665                                  ;
 12666                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12667                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12668                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12669                                  
 12670                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12671                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12672 0000122A C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12673 0000122E C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12674                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12675                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12676 00001231 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12677                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12678 00001233 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12679                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12680                                  					; unformatted_media
 12681 00001238 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12682 0000123A FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12683                                  
 12684                                  GafDone:				
 12685 0000123C 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12686 0000123F C3                      		retn
 12687                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12688                                  
 12689                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12690                                  
 12691                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12692                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12693                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12694                                  ;
 12695                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12696                                  ;
 12697                                  ; input :
 12698                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12699                                  ;
 12700                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12701                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12702                                  
 12703                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12704                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12705 00001240 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12706 00001244 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12707                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12708 00001247 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12709                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12710                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12711 0000124C 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12712 00001250 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12713                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12714 00001252 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12715                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12716                                  					; unformatted_media
 12717                                  saf_Done:				
 12718 00001257 C3                      		retn

 12720                                  
 12721                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12722                                  
 12723                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12724                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12725                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12726                                  ;
 12727                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12728                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12729                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12730                                  ;
 12731                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12732                                  
 12733                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12734                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12735 00001258 06                      		push	es
 12736 00001259 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12737 0000125D 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12738                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12739 00001261 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12740                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12741 00001263 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12742 00001265 0E                      		push	cs
 12743 00001266 07                      		pop	es
 12744 00001267 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12745                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12746 0000126A BF[3B0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12747                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12748                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12749 0000126D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12750 0000126F F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12751 00001271 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12752 00001273 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12753                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12754                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12755                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12756                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12757                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12758                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12759                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12760 00001276 07                      		pop	es
 12761                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12762                                  		; cf = 0
 12763                                  		;clc
 12764 00001277 C3                      		retn
 12765                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12766                                  nosupport:				
 12767 00001278 07                      		pop	es
 12768 00001279 E959EE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12769                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12770                                  
 12771                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12772                                  
 12773                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12774                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12775                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12776                                  ;
 12777                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12778                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12779                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12780                                  ;	    drive)
 12781                                  ;
 12782                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12783                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12784                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12785                                  ;
 12786                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12787                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12788                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12789                                  ;
 12790                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12791                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12792                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12793                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12794                                  ;
 12795                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12796                                  ;
 12797                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12798                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12799                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12800                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12801                                  ; 
 12802                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12803                                  
 12804                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12805                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12806 0000127C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12807 00001280 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12808                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12809                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12810 00001283 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12811 00001285 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12812                                  		;
 12813 00001287 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12814                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12815                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12816                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12817 0000128B B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12818                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12819 0000128D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12820 0000128F 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12821 00001291 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12822                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12823 00001293 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12824 00001295 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12825 00001297 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12826 00001299 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12827 0000129B 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12828 0000129D 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12829 0000129F 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12830 000012A1 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12831                                  GotMediaType:				
 12832 000012A3 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12833                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12834                                  		; cf = 0
 12835                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12836 000012A6 C3                      		retn
 12837                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12838                                  
 12839                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 12840 000012A7 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 12841 000012AA 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error

 12843 000012AE 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 12844 000012B1 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 12845                                  UnknownMediaType:

 12847                                  SenseErrExit:

 12849 000012B7 F9                      		stc

 12856                                  
 12857                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12858                                  
 12859                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12860                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12861                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12862                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12863                                  
 12864                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12865                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12866                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12867                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12868                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12869                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12870                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12871                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12872                                  ;
 12873                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12874                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12875                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12876                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12877                                  ;
 12878                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12879                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12880                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12881                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12882                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12883                                  ;
 12884                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12885                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12886                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12887                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12888                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12889                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12890                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12891                                  
 12892                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12893                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12894                                  
 12895                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12896                                  
 12897                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12898 000012B9 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12899 000012BC 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12900 000012BE 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12901 000012C1 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12902                                  
 12903                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12904                                  
 12905 000012C3 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 12906 000012C6 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 12907 000012C8 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 12908 000012CB 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12909 000012CD E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12910                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12911                                  
 12912                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12913 000012D0 CF                      		iret
 12914                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12915                                  
 12916                                  int2f_replace_int13:

 12919                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 12920                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 12921                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 12922 000012D4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 12923                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12924                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 12925                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 12926                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 12927                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 12928 000012D9 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 12929 000012DD FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 12930 000012E1 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 12931 000012E5 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 12932                                  
 12933                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 12934                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 12935                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 12936                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 12937 000012E9 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 12938 000012ED A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 12939 000012F0 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 12940 000012F4 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 12941                                  
 12942 000012F8 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 12943 000012F9 5B                      		pop	bx
 12944 000012FA 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 12945 000012FB 5A                      		pop	dx
 12946 000012FC 58                      		pop	ax
 12947                                  i2f_iret:				
 12948 000012FD CF                      		iret

 13008 0000133B C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]

 13017                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13018                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13019                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13020                                  
 13021                                  win386call:				
 13022 00001341 1E                      		push	ds
 13023 00001342 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13024                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13025                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13026 00001347 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13027                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13028 00001349 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13029 0000134B 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13030                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13031 0000134D 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13032                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13033 0000134F F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13034                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13035 00001352 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13036                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13037 00001354 8026[CE08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13038 00001359 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 13039                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13040                                  
 13041                                  Win386Init:	
 13042                                  		; 12/12/2022

 13049                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es

 13051 00001369 8C06[9E08]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 13052                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 13053 0000136D BB[9A08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 13054 00001370 1E                      		push	ds
 13055 00001371 07                      		pop	es
 13056                                  win_iret:				
 13057 00001372 1F                      		pop	ds
 13058                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022	
 13059 00001373 EB88                    		jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 13060                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13062                                  handle_multmult:			
 13063 00001375 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 13064 00001377 7515                    		jnz	short try_2
 13065 00001379 1E                      		push	ds
 13066 0000137A E84700                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13067                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13068                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13069                                  		;dec	bx
 13070 0000137D BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13071 00001380 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13072 00001382 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13073 00001384 F7D3                    		not	bx
 13074 00001386 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13075 00001388 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13076 0000138A 43                      		inc	bx
 13077                                  try_1:

 13079 0000138C EBE5                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13080                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13081                                  
 13082                                  try_2:					
 13083 0000138E 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 13084 00001390 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 13085 00001392 1E                      		push	ds
 13086                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13087                                  		;xor	di, di
 13088                                  		;dec	di
 13089 00001393 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 13090 00001396 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 13091 00001398 E82900                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13092 0000139B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13093 0000139E 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA
 13094 000013A0 F7DF                    		neg	di		; free space in HMA
 13095 000013A2 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 13096 000013A4 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 13097                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13098                                  		;sub	di, di
 13099                                  		;dec	di
 13100 000013A6 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 13101 000013A9 EB16                    		jmp	short InsuffHMA
 13102                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13103                                  
 13104                                  try_4:					
 13105                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 13106 000013AB 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 13107 000013AF 83C30F                  		add	bx, 15
 13108                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 13109                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13110 000013B2 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 13111                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer	
 13112 000013B5 011E[F508]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx
 13113 000013B9 7506                    		jnz	short InsuffHMA
 13114 000013BB C706[F508]FFFF          		mov	word [FreeHMAPtr], 0FFFFh ; -1
 13115                                  		;mov	ds:FreeHMAPtr, 0FFFFh
 13116                                  					; no more HMA if we have wrapped
 13117                                  InsuffHMA:				
 13118 000013C1 1F                      		pop	ds
 13119                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13120                                  try_3:

 13123                                  
 13124                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13125                                  ;try_3:					
 13126                                  		;jmp	ii2f_iret
