 14017                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14018                                  dsk_init:				; 2C7h:1742h = 70h:3CB2h
 14019 000016E9 8A26[7500]              		mov	ah, [drvmax]
 14020 000016ED BF[8706]                		mov	di, dskdrvs
 14021 000016F0 1E                      		push	ds		; pass result in es:di
 14022 000016F1 07                      		pop	es
 14023 000016F2 E9C3EE                  		jmp	SetPtrSav
 14024                                  
 14025                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14026                                  
 14027                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14028                                  ; install_bds installs a bds at location es:di into the current linked list of
 14029                                  ; bds maintained by this device driver. it places the bds at the end of the
 14030                                  ; list. Trashes (at least) ax, bx, di, si
 14031                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14032                                  
 14033                                  install_bds:		
 14034 000016F5 1E                      		push	ds		; save Bios_Data segment
 14035 000016F6 BE[1901]                		mov	si, start_bds	; beginning of chain
 14036                                  
 14037                                  		; ds:si now points to link to first bds
 14038                                  		; assume bds list is non-empty
 14039                                  loop_next_bds:				
 14040 000016F9 C534                    		lds	si, [si]	; [si+BDS.link]
 14041                                  					; fetch	next bds
 14042 000016FB 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14043 000016FF 384404                  		cmp	[si+4],	al	; does this one	share a	physical
 14044                                  					; drive	with new one?
 14045 00001702 7518                    		jnz	short next_bds
 14046 00001704 B310                    		mov	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 14047 00001706 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14048                                  					; set both of them to i_am_mult	if so
 14049 0000170A 085C23                  		or	[si+23h], bl	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14050 0000170D 26806523DF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0DFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags],~fi_own_physical
 14051                                  					; we don't own it
 14052 00001712 8A5C23                  		mov	bl, [si+23h]	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14053                                  					; determine if changeline available
 14054 00001715 80E302                  		and	bl, 2		; fchangeline
 14055 00001718 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14056                                  next_bds:				
 14057 0000171C 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14058                                  					; are we at end	of list?
 14059 0000171F 75D8                    		jnz	short loop_next_bds
 14060 00001721 8C4402                  		mov	word [si+2], es ; [si+BDS.link+2],es
 14061                                  					; install bds
 14062 00001724 893C                    		mov	[si], di
 14063 00001726 26C705FFFF              		mov	word [es:di], 0FFFFh ; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14064                                  					; set next pointer to null
 14065 0000172B 1F                      		pop	ds
 14066                                  
 14067                                  ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 6.0 Code)
 14068                                  ;
 14069                                  ; **** If the new drive has a higher EOT value, we must alter the
 14070                                  ;      'eot' variable appropriately.
 14071                                  ;
 14072                                  ;		; 01/06/2019
 14073                                  ;		;mov	al,[es:di+52]
 14074                                  ;		mov	al,[es:di+BDS.rsecpertrack]
 14075                                  ;
 14076                                  ;		cmp	al,[eot]
 14077                                  ;		jbe	short _eot_ok
 14078                                  ;		mov	[eot],al
 14079                                  
 14080 0000172C C3                      		retn
 14081                                  
 14082                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14083                                  
 14084                                  ; 17/10/2022
 14085                                  ;DRVLET	equ drvlet - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
 14086                                  ;SNGMSG	equ sngmsg - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	
 14087                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14088                                  DRVLET equ drvlet
 14089                                  SNGMSG equ sngmsg
 14090                                  
 14091                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14092                                  
 14093                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14094                                  ;  ask to swap the disk in drive a:
 14095                                  ;	es:di -> bds
 14096                                  ;	ds -> Bios_Data
 14097                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14098                                  
 14099                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14100 0000172D F606[CE08]01            swpdsk:		test	byte [IsWin386], 1			
 14101                                  		;test	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Is win386 present?
 14102 00001732 7405                    		jz	short no_win386	; no, skip SetFocus
 14103                                  		
 14104                                  		; set focus to the correct VM
 14105                                  		;;call	far 70h:8D1h	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:179Ah
 14106                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14107 00001734 9A[CF08]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:V86_Crit_SetFocus
 14108                                  		;call	far ptr	V86_Crit_SetFocus ; call far 70h:8D1h
 14109                                  					; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:V86_Crit_SetFocus
 14110                                  no_win386:				
 14111 00001739 51                      		push	cx
 14112 0000173A 52                      		push	dx
 14113 0000173B 268A5505                		mov	dl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 14114                                  					; get the drive	letter
 14115                                  
 14116                                  ; WARNING : next two instructions assume that if the new disk is for drive B
 14117                                  ;           then existing dsk is drive A & vice versa
 14118                                  
 14119 0000173F 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
 14120 00001741 80F601                  		xor	dh, 1
 14121 00001744 29C9                    		sub	cx, cx		; nobody has handled swap disk
 14122 00001746 B8004A                  		mov	ax, 4A00h	; multMULT<<8)|multMULTSWPDSK
 14123                                  					; broad	cast code for swap disk
 14124                                  					; Broadcast it
 14125 00001749 CD2F                    		int	2Fh	
 14126 0000174B 41                      		inc	cx		; cx == -1 ?
 14127 0000174C 741E                    		jz	short swpdsk9	; somebody has handled it
 14128                                  
 14129                                  ; using a different drive in a one drive system so request the user change disks
 14130                                  
 14131 0000174E 80C241                  		add	dl, 'A'
 14132                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14133 00001751 2E8816[8B17]            		mov	[cs:DRVLET], dl
 14134                                  		; 16/10/2022
 14135                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:drvlet], dl
 14136                                  		;mov	byte ptr cs:17E4h, dl ; [cs:drvlet]
 14137                                  					; 0070h:3D54h =	2C7h:17E4h
 14138 00001756 BE[6F17]                		mov	si, SNGMSG
 14139                                  		;mov	si, 17C8h	; sngmsg
 14140                                  					; 0070h:3D38h =	2C7h:17C8h
 14141 00001759 53                      		push	bx
 14142 0000175A 2E                      		cs
 14143 0000175B AC                      		lodsb			; get the next character of the message
 14144                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si]
 14145                                  wrmsg_loop:				
 14146 0000175C CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
 14147                                  					; AL = character to display
 14148 0000175E 2E                      		cs
 14149 0000175F AC                      		lodsb
 14150                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si] ; cs lodsb
 14151                                  					; get the next character of the	message
 14152 00001760 08C0                    		or	al, al
 14153 00001762 75F8                    		jnz	short wrmsg_loop
 14154 00001764 E8A0EA                  		call	con_flush	; flush out keyboard queue
 14155                                  					; call rom-bios
 14156 00001767 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 14157 00001769 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 14158                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 14159 0000176B 5B                      		pop	bx
 14160                                  swpdsk9:				
 14161 0000176C 5A                      		pop	dx
 14162 0000176D 59                      		pop	cx
 14163 0000176E C3                      		retn
 14164                                  
 14165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14166                                  
 14167                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14168                                  
 14169                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14170                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14171                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14172                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14173                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14174                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14175                                  
 14176                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14177 0000176F 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14178 00001771 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14178 0000177A 736B6574746520666F-
 14178 00001783 7220647269766520   
 14179                                  
 14180                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14181 0000178B 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14181 00001794 65737320616E79206B-
 14181 0000179D 6579207768656E2072-
 14181 000017A6 656164790D0A       
 14182 000017AC 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14183                                  
 14184                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14185                                  
 14186                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14187                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14188                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14189                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14190                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14191                                  
 14192                                  chkopcnt:		
 14193 000017AE 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14194 000017B3 C3                      		retn
 14195                                  
 14196                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14197                                  
 14198                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14199                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14200                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14201                                  ;
 14202                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14203                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14204                                  
 14205                                  mediacheck:	
 14206 000017B4 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14207 000017B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14208 000017B9 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14209 000017BC 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14210 000017BE E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14211 000017C1 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14212 000017C3 50                      		push	ax
 14213 000017C4 52                      		push	dx
 14214 000017C5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14215                                  					; set logical drive number
 14216 000017C9 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14217 000017CB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14218                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14219                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14220 000017CD 5A                      		pop	dx
 14221 000017CE 58                      		pop	ax
 14222 000017CF 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14223 000017D1 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14224                                  
 14225                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14226                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14227                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14228                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14229                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14230                                  ; status.
 14231                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14232 000017D4 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14233 000017D8 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14234                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14235                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14236                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14237                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14238 000017DC 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14239                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14240                                  
 14241                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14242                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14243                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14244                                  
 14245 000017DE 50                      		push	ax
 14246 000017DF 51                      		push	cx
 14247 000017E0 52                      		push	dx
 14248 000017E1 E86FED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14249 000017E4 5A                      		pop	dx
 14250 000017E5 59                      		pop	cx
 14251 000017E6 58                      		pop	ax
 14252 000017E7 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14253 000017E9 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14254                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14255 000017EB 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14256                                  mediaret:				
 14257 000017ED C3                      		retn
 14258                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14259                                  
 14260                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14261                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14262                                  ; or write.
 14263                                  
 14264                                  mediadovolid:				
 14265 000017EE E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14266 000017F1 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14267 000017F3 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14268 000017F6 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14269 000017F8 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14271                                  
 14272                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14273                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14274                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14275                                  ; dos.
 14276                                  ;
 14277                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14278                                  
 14279                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14280                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14281                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14282                                  
 14283                                  checklatchio:	
 14284                                  
 14285                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14286                                  			
 14287 000017FB E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14288 000017FE 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14289                                  
 14290                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14291                                  
 14292 00001800 E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14293 00001803 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14294                                  
 14295                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14296                                  ; expensive verification.
 14297                                  
 14298 00001805 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14299 00001808 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14300 0000180A E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14301 0000180D 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14302 0000180F 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14303 00001811 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14304 00001813 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14305                                  checklatchret:				
 14306 00001816 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14307                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14308 00001819 F9                      		stc
 14309 0000181A 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14310                                  checkret:				
 14311 0000181B C3                      		retn
 14312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14313                                  
 14314                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14315                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14316                                  ;
 14317                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14318                                  
 14319                                  checkfatvid:				
 14320 0000181C E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14321 0000181F 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14322 00001821 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14323                                  
 14324                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14325                                  
 14326                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14327                                  
 14328                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14329                                  
 14330                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14331                                  ;
 14332                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14333                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14334                                  ;
 14335                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14336                                  ;
 14337                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14338                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14339                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14340                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14341                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14342                                  ;
 14343                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14344                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14345                                  ; routine.)
 14346                                  ;
 14347                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14348                                  
 14349                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14350                                  check_vid:
 14351                                  
 14352                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14353                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14354                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14355                                  
 14356 00001823 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14357                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14358                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14359 00001828 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14360 0000182A E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14361 0000182D 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14362 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14363 00001831 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14364                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14365 00001836 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14366                                  					; if not fat system
 14367 00001838 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14368 0000183B 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14369 0000183D E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14370 00001840 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14371                                  					; definitely changed
 14372 00001843 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14373                                  
 14374 00001845 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14375                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14376 00001846 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14377                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14378                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14379                                  		;clc
 14380                                  checkfatret:				
 14381 00001849 C3                      		retn
 14382                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14383                                  
 14384                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14385                                  changed_drv:
 14386 0000184A F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14387 0000184B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14388                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14389 00001850 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14390                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14391                                  
 14392                                  ; extended id check
 14393                                  
 14394                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14395                                  
 14396                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14397                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14398                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14399                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14400                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14401                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14402                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14403                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14404                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14405                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14406                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14407                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14408                                  ;
 14409                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14410                                  
 14411                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14412                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14413 00001851 50                      		push	ax
 14414                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14415                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14416 00001852 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14417 00001855 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14418 00001859 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14419 0000185B A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14420 0000185E 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14421 00001862 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14422 00001864 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14423                                  					; don't know
 14424 00001866 58                      		pop	ax
 14425 00001867 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14426                                  					; reset the flag
 14427                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14428                                  
 14429                                  ext_changed:				
 14430 00001869 58                      		pop	ax
 14431 0000186A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14432                                  					; disk changed!
 14433                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14434                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14435                                  		;clc
 14436 0000186D EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14437                                  
 14438                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14439                                  
 14440                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14441                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14442                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14443                                  ;
 14444                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14445                                  
 14446                                  checkio:				
 14447 0000186F 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14448 00001872 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14449 00001874 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14450 00001877 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14451 00001879 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14452 0000187C 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14453 0000187E E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14454 00001881 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14455 00001883 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14456 00001885 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14457 00001887 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14458 00001888 C3                      		retn
 14459                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14460                                  
 14461                                  checkioerr:				
 14462 00001889 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14463                                  
 14464                                  checkioret:				
 14465 0000188C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14466 0000188D E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14467                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14468                                  
 14469                                  no_error_map:				
 14470 00001890 E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14471                                  
 14472                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14473                                  
 14474                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14475                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14476                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14477                                  
 14478                                  returnvid:		
 14479 00001893 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14480                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14481 00001896 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14482 00001899 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14483 0000189B F9                      		stc
 14484 0000189C C3                      		retn
 14485                                  
 14486                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14487                                  
 14488                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14489                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14490                                  ;
 14491                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14492                                  ; **trashes si**
 14493                                  
 14494                                  media_set_vid:				
 14495 0000189D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14496                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14497                                  
 14498                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14499                                  
 14500                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14501                                  
 14502                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14503                                  
 14504                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14505                                  vid_into_packet:
 14506 000018A0 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14507 000018A1 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14508 000018A5 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14509 000018A8 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14510 000018AA 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14511 000018AD 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14512 000018B0 1F                      		pop	ds
 14513                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14514 000018B1 C3                      		retn
 14515                                  
 14516                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14517                                  
 14518                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14519                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14520                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14521                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14522                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14523                                  ;
 14524                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14525                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14526                                  ;
 14527                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14528                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14529                                  ;		carry set
 14530                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14531                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14532                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14533                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14534                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14535                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14536                                  ;
 14537                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14538                                  
 14539                                  hidensity:
 14540                                  
 14541                                  ; check for correct drive
 14542                                  		
 14543                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14544 000018B2 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14545                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14546                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14547 000018B7 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14548                                  
 14549                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14550                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14551                                  
 14552 000018B9 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14553 000018BE 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14554                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14555                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14556 000018C0 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14557 000018C3 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14558                                  
 14559                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14560                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14561                                  
 14562 000018C5 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14563                                  					; ffOther
 14564 000018CA 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14565 000018CC 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14566                                  					; ff288
 14567 000018D1 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14568 000018D3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14569 000018D5 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14570                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14571                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14572 000018D8 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14573                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14574                                  					; 2 sides
 14575 000018DB BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14576                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14577                                  					; & head max
 14578 000018DE 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14579 000018E1 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14580                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14581                                  
 14582                                  Is720K:					
 14583 000018E4 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14584 000018E7 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14585                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14586                                  
 14587                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14588                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14589                                  		;retn
 14590                                  
 14591                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14592                                  
 14593                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14594                                  
 14595                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14596                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14597                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14598                                  ;
 14599                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14600                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14601                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14602                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14603                                  ;
 14604                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14605                                  ;
 14606                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14607                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14608                                  
 14609                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14610 000018EA 06                      		push	es
 14611 000018EB 57                      		push	di
 14612                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14613                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14614 000018EC C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14615                                  
 14616                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14617                                  
 14618                                  scan_bds:				
 14619 000018F0 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14620 000018F4 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14621                                  
 14622                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14623                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14624                                  
 14625 000018F6 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14626                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14627                                  get_next_bds:				
 14628 000018FA 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14629                                  					; go to	next bds
 14630 000018FD 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14631 00001900 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14632 00001902 5F                      		pop	di
 14633 00001903 07                      		pop	es
 14634 00001904 C3                      		retn
 14635                                  
 14636                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14637                                  
 14638                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14639                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14640                                  ;
 14641                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14642                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14643                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14644                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14645                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14646                                  
 14647                                  checkromchange:	
 14648                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14649                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14650 00001905 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14651                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14652                                  					; fchanged
 14653 0000190A C3                      		retn
 14654                                  
 14655                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14656                                  
 14657                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14658                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14659                                  ;
 14660                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14661                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14662                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14663                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14664                                  
 14665                                  resetchanged:	
 14666                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14667                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14668 0000190B 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14669                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14670                                  					; ~fchanged
 14671 00001910 C3                      		retn
 14672                                  
 14673                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14674                                  
 14675                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14676                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14677                                  ;
 14678                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14679                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14680                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14681                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14682                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14683                                  
 14684                                  haschange:
 14685                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14686                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14687 00001911 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14688                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14689                                  					; fchangeline
 14690 00001916 C3                      		retn
 14691                                  
 14692                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14693                                  
 14694                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14695                                  
 14696                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14697                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14698                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14699                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14700                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14701                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14702                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14703                                  
 14704                                  ; set_volume_id
 14705                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14706                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14707                                  ;
 14708                                  ;   on entry:
 14709                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14710                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14711                                  ;
 14712                                  ;   on exit:
 14713                                  ;	carry clear:
 14714                                  ;	   successful call
 14715                                  ;	carry set
 14716                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14717                                  
 14718                                  set_volume_id:				
 14719 00001917 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14720 00001918 50                      		push	ax
 14721 00001919 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14722 0000191C 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14723 0000191E E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14724 00001921 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14725 00001923 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14726 00001926 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14727                                  setvret:				
 14728                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14729                                  		; cf = 0
 14730                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14731 00001929 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14732 0000192A 5A                      		pop	dx
 14733 0000192B C3                      		retn
 14734                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14735                                  
 14736                                  seterr:					
 14737 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14738 0000192D 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14739 0000192E C3                      		retn
 14740                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14741 0000192F 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14742                                  
 14743                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14744                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14745                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14746                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14747                                  
 14748                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14749                                  
 14750                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14751                                  
 14752                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14753                                  ;
 14754                                  ;   on entry:
 14755                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14756                                  ;
 14757                                  ;   on exit:
 14758                                  ;	carry clear
 14759                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14760                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14761                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14762                                  ;
 14763                                  ;	carry set:
 14764                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14765                                  
 14766                                  read_volume_id:
 14767 00001931 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14768 00001932 51                      		push	cx
 14769 00001933 53                      		push	bx
 14770 00001934 50                      		push	ax
 14771 00001935 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14772 00001936 57                      		push	di
 14773 00001937 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14774 00001938 07                      		pop	es
 14775 00001939 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14776 0000193C BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14777 0000193F B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14778 00001942 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14779 00001944 5F                      		pop	di
 14780 00001945 07                      		pop	es
 14781 00001946 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14782                                  					; # of fats
 14783 0000194A 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14784                                  					; sectors / fat
 14785 0000194E F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14786 00001950 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14787                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14788                                  					;
 14789                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14790                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14791 00001954 2EA3[2F19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14792                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14793                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14794 00001958 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14795                                  					; # root dir entries
 14796 0000195C B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14797 0000195E D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14798 00001960 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14799                                  next_sec:				
 14800 00001962 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14801 00001963 2EA1[2F19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14802                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14803                                  					; get sector #
 14804 00001967 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14805                                  					; sectors / track
 14806 0000196B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14807 0000196D F7F1                    		div	cx
 14808                                  
 14809                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14810                                  
 14811 0000196F 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14812                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14813 00001970 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14814 00001972 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14815 00001974 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14816                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14817 00001978 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14818 0000197A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14819 0000197C E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14820                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14821 0000197F 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14822 00001981 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14823 00001984 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14824                                  fvid_loop:				
 14825 00001986 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14826 00001989 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14827 0000198B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14828 0000198E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14829 00001990 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14830 00001993 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14831                                  ent_loop:				
 14832 00001995 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14833 00001998 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14834 0000199A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14835 0000199B 2EFF06[2F19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14836                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14837                                  					; next sector
 14838 000019A0 E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14839                                  notfound:				
 14840 000019A2 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14841 000019A4 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14842                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14843                                  
 14844                                  found_vid:				
 14845 000019A6 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14846 000019A7 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14847 000019A9 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14848 000019AA 57                      		push	di
 14849 000019AB 1E                      		push	ds
 14850 000019AC 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14851 000019AD BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14852 000019B0 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14853                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14854 000019B3 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14855 000019B5 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14856 000019B7 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14857 000019B8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14858 000019BA 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14859 000019BB 07                      		pop	es
 14860                                  fvid_ret:				
 14861 000019BC 58                      		pop	ax
 14862                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14863                                  		; cf = 0
 14864                                  		;clc
 14865                                  rvidret:				
 14866 000019BD 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14867 000019BE 59                      		pop	cx
 14868 000019BF 5A                      		pop	dx
 14869 000019C0 C3                      		retn
 14870                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14871                                  
 14872                                  no_vid:					
 14873 000019C1 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14874 000019C2 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14875                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14876                                  
 14877                                  readviderr:				
 14878 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14879 000019C5 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14880 000019C6 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14881                                  
 14882                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14883                                  
 14884                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14885                                  ;
 14886                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14887                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14888                                  
 14889                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14890 000019C8 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14891 000019C9 56                      		push	si
 14892 000019CA 51                      		push	cx
 14893 000019CB BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14894                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14895 000019CE 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14896                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14897 000019D1 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14898 000019D4 FC                      		cld
 14899 000019D5 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14900 000019D7 59                      		pop	cx
 14901 000019D8 5E                      		pop	si
 14902 000019D9 5F                      		pop	di
 14903 000019DA C3                      		retn
 14904                                  
 14905                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14906                                  
 14907                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14908                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14909                                  ;
 14910                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14911                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14912                                  
 14913                                  check_volume_id:	
 14914 000019DB 57                      		push	di
 14915 000019DC 51                      		push	cx
 14916 000019DD BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14917                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14918 000019E0 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14919                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14920 000019E3 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14921 000019E6 FC                      		cld
 14922 000019E7 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14923 000019E9 59                      		pop	cx
 14924 000019EA 5F                      		pop	di
 14925 000019EB C3                      		retn
 14926                                  
 14927                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14928                                  
 14929                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14930                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14931                                  ;
 14932                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14933                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14934                                  ;
 14935                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14936                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14937                                  ;
 14938                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14939                                  
 14940                                  fat_check:		
 14941 000019EC 50                      		push	ax
 14942 000019ED 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14943 000019EF A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14944 000019F2 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14945                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14946 000019F6 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14947 000019F8 4E                      		dec	si
 14948                                  okret1:					
 14949 000019F9 58                      		pop	ax
 14950 000019FA C3                      		retn
 14951                                  
 14952                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14953                                  
 14954                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14955                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14956                                  
 14957                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14958                                  
 14959                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14960                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14961                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14962                                  
 14963                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14964                                  
 14965                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14966                                  		;db 0
 14967                                  
 14968                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14969                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14970                                  
 14971                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14972 000019FB 00<rep 5h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14973                                  %endif
 14974                                  
 14975                                  ;align 16
 14976                                  
 14977                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14978                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14979                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14980                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14981                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14982                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
