 30595                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30596                                  ; Entry:  None
 30597                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30598                                  ; Error:  None
 30599                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30600                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30601                                  
 30602                                  FreezeUM:
 30603                                  	push	ax
 30604                                  	push	cx
 30605                                  	push	dx
 30606                                  	push	es
 30607                                  
 30608                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30609                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30610                                  
 30611                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30612                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30613                                  
 30614                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30615                                  	mov	es,ax
 30616                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30617                                  
 30618                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30619                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30620                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30621                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30622                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30623                                  
 30624                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30625                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30626                                  
 30627                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30628                                  fum20:	
 30629                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30630                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30631                                  
 30632                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30633                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30634                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30635                                  
 30636                                  	call	frezMCB
 30637                                  fum30:	
 30638                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30639                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30640                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30641                                  
 30642                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30643                                  	mov     ax,es
 30644                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30645                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30646                                  	inc     ax
 30647                                  	mov     es,ax
 30648                                  	
 30649                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30650                                  
 30651                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30652                                  	pop	dx
 30653                                  	pop	cx
 30654                                  	pop	ax
 30655                                  	retn
 30656                                  
 30657                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30658                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30659                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30660                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30661                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30662                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30663                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30664                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30665                                  
 30666                                  UmbTest:
 30667                                  	push	ax
 30668                                  	push	bx
 30669                                  	push	ds
 30670                                  	push	es
 30671                                  
 30672                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 30673                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30674                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30675                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30676                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30677                                  
 30678                                  	pop	es
 30679                                  	pop	ds
 30680                                  	pop	bx
 30681                                  	pop	ax
 30682                                  	retn
 30683                                  
 30684                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30685                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30686                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30687                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30688                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30689                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30690                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30691                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30692                                  
 30693                                  WalkMem:
 30694                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30695                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30696                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30697                                  		   	
 30698                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30699                                  	int	21h
 30700                                  
 30701                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30702                                  	mov	es,ax
 30703                                  
 30704                                  ; ------------------------------
 30705                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30706                                  ; ------------------------------
 30707                                  
 30708                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30709                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30710                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30711                                  
 30712                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30713                                  
 30714                                  	mov     bx,es
 30715                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30716                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30717                                  	inc     bx
 30718                                  	mov     es,bx
 30719                                  		
 30720                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30721                                  um20:	
 30722                                  	mov	ax,es
 30723                                  
 30724                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30725                                  
 30726                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30727                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30728                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30729                                  	retn
 30730                                  
 30731                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30732                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30733                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30734                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30735                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30736                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30737                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30738                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30739                                  
 30740                                  hl_unlink:
 30741                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30742                                  
 30743                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30744                                  	;
 30745                                  	;push	ds
 30746                                  	;push	cs
 30747                                  	;pop	ds
 30748                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30749                                  	;pop	ds
 30750                                  
 30751                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30752                                  
 30753                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30754                                  	int	21h
 30755                                  	retn
 30756                                  
 30757                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30758                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30759                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30760                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30761                                  
 30762                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30763                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30764                                  
 30765                                  ;   Modification log:
 30766                                  ;
 30767                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 30768                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 30769                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 30770                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 30771                                  
 30772                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 30773                                  
 30774                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30775                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 30776                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30777                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 30778                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 30779                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 30780                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30781                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 30782                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30783                                  
 30784                                  UnHideUMBs:
 30785                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 30786                                  
 30787                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30788                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 30789                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 30790                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 30791                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 30792                                  ;    every command execution.
 30793                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30794                                  
 30795                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 30796                                  	;
 30797                                  	;push	ds
 30798                                  	;push	cs
 30799                                  	;pop	ds
 30800                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 30801                                  	;pop	ds	
 30802                                  
 30803                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 30804                                  
 30805                                  	or	al,al
 30806                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 30807                                  
 30808                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 30809                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 30810                                  	retn			; that.
 30811                                  uhu10:	
 30812                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 30813                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 30814                                  
 30815                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30816                                  	;
 30817                                  	;push	es
 30818                                  	;push	cs
 30819                                  	;pop	es
 30820                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30821                                  	;pop	ds	
 30822                                  
 30823                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30824                                  
 30825                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 30826                                  
 30827                                  	pop	ax
 30828                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30829                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 30830                                  	retn
 30831                                  
 30832                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30833                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 30834                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30835                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30836                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30837                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30838                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30839                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30840                                  
 30841                                  he_unlink:
 30842                                  	xor	bh, bh
 30843                                  
 30844                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 30845                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 30846                                  
 30847                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30848                                  	int	21h
 30849                                  	retn
 30850                                  
 30851                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30852                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 30853                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30854                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30855                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 30856                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 30857                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30858                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30859                                  
 30860                                  FreeUMBs:
 30861                                  	push	ax
 30862                                  	push	es
 30863                                  
 30864                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30865                                  	jc	short fusX
 30866                                  
 30867                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 30868                                  fus10:	
 30869                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30870                                  	jnz	short fus20
 30871                                  	call	freeMCB
 30872                                  fus20:	   
 30873                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30874                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30875                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 30876                                  
 30877                                  	mov	ax,es
 30878                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30879                                  	inc	ax
 30880                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30881                                  
 30882                                  	jmp	short fus10
 30883                                  fusX:	
 30884                                  	pop	es
 30885                                  	pop	ax
 30886                                  	retn
 30887                                  
 30888                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30889                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 30890                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30891                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30892                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 30893                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30894                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30895                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30896                                  
 30897                                  isHideMCB:
 30898                                  	;push	ax
 30899                                  
 30900                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 30901                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 30902                                  
 30903                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 30904                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 30905                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 30906                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30907                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30908                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 30909                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 30910                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30911                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30912                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30913                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30914                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30915                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30916                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30917                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30918                                  ihm_x:	
 30919                                  	;pop	ax
 30920                                  	retn
 30921                                  
 30922                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30923                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 30924                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30925                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30926                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 30927                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30928                                  ; USES:     AX
 30929                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30930                                  
 30931                                  freeMCB:
 30932                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30933                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 30934                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30935                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30936                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30937                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30938                                  	retn
 30939                                  
 30940                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30941                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30942                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30943                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30944                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30945                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30946                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30947                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30948                                  
 30949                                  HeadUmb:
 30950                                  	; 13/05/2019
 30951                                  
 30952                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30953                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 30954                                  	;push	es
 30955                                  	;push	bx ; *
 30956                                  
 30957                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30958                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30959                                  
 30960                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30961                                  	int	21h
 30962                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 30963                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 30964                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 30965                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 30966                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30967                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30968                                  
 30969                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 30970                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 30971                                  xhu_e:	
 30972                                  	;stc
 30973                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 30974                                  xhu_x:	
 30975                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 30976                                  	;pop	es	
 30977                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 30978                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 30979                                  	retn
 30980                                  
 30981                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30982                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 30983                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30984                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30985                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 30986                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30987                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 30988                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30989                                  
 30990                                  linkumb:
 30991                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 30992                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 30993                                  
 30994                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 30995                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 30996                                  
 30997                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30998                                  	mov	bx,1
 30999                                  	int	21h
 31000                                  lumbX:
 31001                                  	retn
 31002                                  
 31003                                  %endif
 31004                                  
 31005                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31006                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 31007                                  
 31008                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31009                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31010                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31011                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31012                                  
 31013                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31014                                  ;
 31015                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31016                                  ;
 31017                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31018                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31019                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31020                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31021                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31022                                  ;
 31023                                  ;	Output : none
 31024                                  ;
 31025                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31026                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31027                                  ;
 31028                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31029                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31030                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31031                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31032                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31033                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31034                                  
 31035                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31036                                  InitDevLoad:
 31037                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31038                                  	; ds = cs
 31039 00002818 803E[071F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31040                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31041                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31042 0000281D 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31043                                  
 31044                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31045                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31046                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31047                                  ;
 31048                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31049                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31050                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31051                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31052                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31053                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31054                                  ;
 31055                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31056                                  ;
 31057                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31058                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31059                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31060                                  ;	pushf
 31061                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31062                                  ;	popf
 31063                                  ;
 31064                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31065                                  ;
 31066                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31067                                  
 31068                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31069                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31070                                  InitForConv:
 31071                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31072                                  	; ds = cs
 31073 0000281F E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31074                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31075 00002822 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31076 00002824 E84F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31077 00002827 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31078 0000282A 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31079                                  					;  in low memory
 31080                                  InitForHi:
 31081                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31082                                  	; ds = cs
 31083                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31084                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31085                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31086 0000282C A1[FD1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31087 0000282F 8B16[F91E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31088 00002833 0316[FB1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31089 00002837 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31090                                  
 31091                                  InitForLo:
 31092                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31093                                  	; ds = cs
 31094                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31095 00002839 C606[071F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31096                                  initforlo_x:
 31097                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31098                                  	; ds = cs
 31099                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31100                                  					;  we are loading low
 31101                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31102                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31103 0000283E A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]

 31180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31181                                  ;
 31182                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31183                                  ;
 31184                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31185                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31186                                  ;		 the device.
 31187                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31188                                  ;
 31189                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31190                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31191                                  ;	UMB.
 31192                                  ;
 31193                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31194                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31195                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31196                                  ;
 31197                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31198                                  
 31199                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31200                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31201                                  
 31202                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31203                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31204                                  	; ds = cs
 31205 0000286F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31206 00002872 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31207 00002875 CD21                    	int	21h
 31208                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31209                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31210                                  
 31211 00002877 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31212 00002879 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31213                                  
 31214 0000287B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31215                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31216                                  	; ds = cs
 31217 0000287C 391E[EA1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31218                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31219 00002880 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31220 00002882 43                      	inc	bx
 31221                                  
 31222 00002883 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31223 00002886 CD21                    	int	21h
 31224 00002888 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31225                                  
 31226                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31227                                  	;dec	ax
 31228                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31229                                  	;
 31230                                  PrepareMark:
 31231 0000288A 1E                      	push	ds
 31232 0000288B 48                      	dec	ax
 31233 0000288C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31234 0000288E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31235 00002894 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31236 0000289A 40                      	inc	ax
 31237 0000289B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31238                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31239                                  	; ds = cs
 31240                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31241                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31242                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31243 0000289C 891E[FB1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31244 000028A0 A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31245 000028A3 A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31246                                  	;
 31247                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31248                                  	; cf=0
 31249                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31250 000028A6 C3                      	retn
 31251                                  gufd_err:
 31252 000028A7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31253                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31254                                  	; ds = cs
 31255                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31256                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31257                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31258 000028A9 A3[FB1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31259 000028AC A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31260 000028AF A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31261 000028B2 F9                      	stc
 31262 000028B3 C3                      	retn

 31264                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31265                                  ;
 31266                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31267                                  ;
 31268                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31269                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31270                                  ;
 31271                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31272                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31273                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31274                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31275                                  ;
 31276                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31277                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31278                                  ;
 31279                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31280                                  
 31281                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31282                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31283                                  
 31284                                  DevSetMark:
 31285 000028B4 06                      	push	es
 31286 000028B5 57                      	push	di
 31287 000028B6 1E                      	push	ds
 31288 000028B7 56                      	push	si

 31290 000028BA 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31291 000028C0 40                      	inc	ax
 31292 000028C1 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31293                                  
 31294                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31295                                  
 31296 000028C5 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31297 000028C6 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31298                                  
 31299 000028CB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31300 000028CD FC                      	cld
 31301                                  dsm_again:
 31302 000028CE AC                      	lodsb
 31303 000028CF 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31304 000028D1 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31305 000028D3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31306 000028D5 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31307                                  isit_slash:
 31308 000028D7 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31309 000028D9 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31310 000028DB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31311 000028DD EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31312                                  isit_null:
 31313 000028DF 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31314 000028E1 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31315 000028E3 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31316                                  
 31317 000028E5 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31318 000028E8 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31319                                  dsm_next_char:
 31320 000028EB AC                      	lodsb
 31321 000028EC 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31322 000028EE 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31323 000028F0 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31324 000028F2 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31325 000028F4 AA                      	stosb
 31326 000028F5 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31327                                  blankout:
 31328 000028F7 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31329 000028F9 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31330 000028FB F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31331                                  dsm_exit:
 31332 000028FD 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31333 000028FE 5E                      	pop	si
 31334 000028FF 1F                      	pop	ds
 31335 00002900 5F                      	pop	di
 31336 00002901 07                      	pop	es
 31337 00002902 C3                      	retn

 31341                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31342                                  ;
 31343                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31344                                  ;
 31345                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31346                                  ;
 31347                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31348                                  ;	in DevSize
 31349                                  ;
 31350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31351                                  
 31352                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31353                                  SizeDevice:
 31354                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31355                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 31357 00002904 06                      	push	es
 31358 00002905 1F                      	pop	ds

 31360 00002908 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31361 0000290B CD21                    	int	21h
 31362 0000290D 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31363                                  
 31364 0000290F 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31365 00002911 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31366 00002914 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx

 31368 00002918 CD21                    	int	21h
 31369 0000291A 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31370 0000291C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31371 0000291F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31372 00002922 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31373 00002926 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31374 00002928 2EC706[EA1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31375                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31376 0000292F EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31377                                  szdev1:
 31378 00002931 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31379 00002933 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31380 00002935 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31381 00002937 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31382 00002939 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31383                                  	;
 31384                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31385 0000293B 2E3B06[081F]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31386                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31387                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31388 00002940 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31389 00002942 2EA1[081F]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31390                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31391 00002946 F8                      	clc
 31392                                  szdev2:
 31393 00002947 2EA3[EA1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31394                                  
 31395                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31396                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31397                                  	; cf=0
 31398                                  	;clc
 31399                                  sd_close:

 31401                                  					;  carry flag

 31404 00002951 9D                      	popf

 31720                                  ;
 31721                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31722                                  ;
 31723                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31724                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31725                                  ;
 31726                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31727                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31728                                  ;
 31729                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31730                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31731                                  ;
 31732                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31733                                  
 31734                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31735                                  
 31736                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31737                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31738                                  GetHexNum:
 31739 00002A37 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31740 00002A39 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31741                                  ghn_next:
 31742 00002A3B 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31743 00002A3E 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31744 00002A41 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31745 00002A43 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31746 00002A46 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31747 00002A48 50                      	push	ax
 31748 00002A49 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31749 00002A4B E83706                  	call	delim
 31750 00002A4E 58                      	pop	ax
 31751                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31752 00002A4F B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31753 00002A52 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31754 00002A54 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31755                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31756                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31757 00002A57 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31758                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31759                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31760                                  ghn_shift1:
 31761 00002A59 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31762 00002A5B D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31763 00002A5D E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31764 00002A5F 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31765 00002A61 46                      	inc	si
 31766 00002A62 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31767                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31768 00002A64 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31769 00002A67 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31770 00002A6A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31771 00002A6E 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31772                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31773                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31774                                  ghn_shift2:
 31775 00002A70 F8                      	clc
 31776 00002A71 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31777 00002A73 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31778 00002A75 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31779 00002A77 F8                      	clc
 31780 00002A78 C3                      	retn
 31781                                  	; 11/12/2022

 31783                                  gnib_err:
 31784 00002A79 F9                      	stc
 31785                                  ghn_ret:
 31786                                  gnib_ret:
 31787 00002A7A C3                      	retn

 31961                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31962                                  ;
 31963                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 31964                                  ;
 31965                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 31966                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 31967                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 31968                                  ;			; DS = data
 31969                                  ;
 31970                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 31971                                  ;
 31972                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 31973                                  ;
 31974                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31975                                  
 31976                                  umb_insert:
 31977 00002AF6 1E                      	push	ds
 31978                                  
 31979                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31980                                  	; ds = cs
 31981                                  
 31982                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31983 00002AF7 8E1E[161F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 31984                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 31985 00002AFB 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 31986 00002AFF 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 31987 00002B01 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31988                                  ui_next:
 31989 00002B03 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 31990                                  					;    new block
 31991 00002B05 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 31992                                  					; Q: is current block the
 31993                                  					;    last
 31994 00002B07 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31995 00002B0D 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 31996                                  					; N: get next block
 31997 00002B0F 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 31998                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 31999 00002B11 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32000 00002B14 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32001                                  
 32002                                  ui_insert:
 32003 00002B16 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32004 00002B18 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32005                                  
 32006 00002B19 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32007 00002B1B F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32008                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32009 00002B1D C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32010                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32011 00002B22 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32012                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32013 00002B28 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32014                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32015 00002B2C C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32016                                  
 32017                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32018                                  
 32019 00002B32 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32020 00002B34 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32021 00002B3A 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32022                                  					; mark as free
 32023 00002B41 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32024                                  					; start & end of new block
 32025 00002B44 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32026                                  
 32027                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32028

 32032 00002B4E 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32033                                  
 32034                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32035                                  					; this block
 32036 00002B4F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32037

 32039 00002B57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32040 00002B5E 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32041 00002B62 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32042                                  
 32043 00002B69 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32044                                  
 32045                                  ui_append:
 32046                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32047 00002B6B 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32048 00002B70 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32049                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32050                                  					; block for the next arena.

 32055 00002B7E 40                      	inc	ax
 32056 00002B7F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32057                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32058 00002B81 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32059                                  
 32060 00002B83 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32061

 32064 00002B92 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32065 00002B96 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32066

 32068 00002B9D 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx

 32070 00002BA5 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32071                                  					; mark as free

 32073 00002BAD 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32074                                  ui_done:
 32075                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32076 00002BB2 1F                      	pop	ds

 32082                                  
 32083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32084                                  ;
 32085                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32086                                  ;
 32087                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32088                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32089                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32090                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32091                                  ;
 32092                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32093                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32094                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32095                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32096                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32097                                  ;
 32098                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32099                                  
 32100                                  umb_coalesce:
 32101                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32102                                  	; ds = cs
 32103 00002BB4 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32104                                  
 32105 00002BB5 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32106                                  
 32107                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32108                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32109 00002BB7 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32110 00002BBB 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32111                                  uc_nextfree:
 32112 00002BC0 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32113 00002BC2 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32114                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32115 00002BC4 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32116 00002BC9 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32117                                  					; N: get next arena
 32118 00002BCB E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32119 00002BCE 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32120 00002BD0 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32121                                  uc_again:
 32122 00002BD2 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32123 00002BD5 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32124                                  uc_check:
 32125 00002BD7 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32126 00002BDC 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32127                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32128 00002BDE 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32129 00002BE3 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32130                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32131 00002BE4 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32132 00002BE8 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32133 00002BEB 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32134 00002BED EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32135                                  
 32136                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32137                                  ;uc_done:
 32138                                  	;retn
 32139                                  
 32140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32141                                  ;
 32142                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32143                                  ;
 32144                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32145                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32146                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32147                                  ;
 32148                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32149                                  
 32150                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32151                                  get_next:
 32152 00002BEF 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32153 00002BF4 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32154                                  _get_next_:
 32155 00002BF6 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32156 00002BF8 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32157 00002BFC 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32158 00002BFD 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32159                                  	;clc
 32160                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32161                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32162                                  	; cf=0
 32163                                  	;clc
 32164 00002BFF C3                      	retn
 32165                                  gn_err:
 32166 00002C00 F9                      	stc
 32167                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32168                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32169 00002C01 C3                      	retn

 32171                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32172                                  ;
 32173                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32174                                  ;
 32175                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32176                                  
 32177                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32178                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32179                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32180                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32181                                  	; ds = cs
 32182 00002C02 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32183 00002C05 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32184                                  
 32185                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32186                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32187                                  
 32188                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32189                                  	; ds = cs
 32190                                  
 32191 00002C07 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32192 00002C09 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32193 00002C0B D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32194                                  
 32195 00002C0D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32196 00002C0F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32197                                  
 32198 00002C11 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32199                                  
 32200 00002C13 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32201 00002C16 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32202                                  	
 32203 00002C18 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32204 00002C1E 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32205                                  					
 32206 00002C25 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32207 00002C29 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32208                                  
 32209                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32210                                  
 32211 00002C30 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32212 00002C32 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32213 00002C38 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32214                                  					; mark as free 
 32215 00002C3F 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32216 00002C40 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32217                                  
 32218                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32219                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32220 00002C45 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32221 00002C49 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32222 00002C4C 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32223                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32224                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32225                                  
 32226                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32227                                  
 32228 00002C4F BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32229 00002C52 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32230 00002C55 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32231                                  ;scan_next
 32232                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32233                                  scannext:
 32234 00002C57 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32235 00002C5B 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32236                                  	
 32237 00002C5D 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32238 00002C5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32239 00002C64 40                      	inc	ax
 32240 00002C65 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32241                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32242                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32243 00002C67 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32244                                  got_last:
 32245 00002C69 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32246 00002C6F 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32247                                  	;clc
 32248                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32249                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32250                                  	; cf=0
 32251                                  	;clc
 32252 00002C75 C3                      	retn
 32253                                  
 32254                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32255                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32256                                  ;	;stc
 32257                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32258                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32259                                  ;	; cf=1
 32260                                  ;	;stc
 32261                                  ;	retn

 32264                                  ;
 32265                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32266                                  ;
 32267                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32268                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32269                                  ;
 32270                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32271                                  
 32272                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32273                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32274                                  	; ds = cs
 32275 00002C76 833E[F91E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32276                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32277 00002C7B 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32278 00002C7D 06                      	push	es
 32279 00002C7E 53                      	push	bx
 32280                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32281                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32282                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32283                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32284 00002C7F 8B1E[FD1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32285 00002C83 2B1E[F91E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32286 00002C87 8E06[F91E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32287                                  	
 32288 00002C8B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32289 00002C8E CD21                    	int	21h
 32290                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32291                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32292                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32293 00002C90 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32294 00002C92 48                      	dec	ax
 32295 00002C93 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32296 00002C95 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32297 00002C9C 5B                      	pop	bx
 32298 00002C9D 07                      	pop	es
 32299                                  su_exit:
 32300 00002C9E C3                      	retn

 32310                                  UnlinkUMB:

 32313 00002C9F 1E                      	push	ds
 32314 00002CA0 06                      	push	es
 32315                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32316 00002CA1 803E[151F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32317                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32318 00002CA6 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32319                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32320 00002CA8 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32321                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32322 00002CAC 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32323 00002CB1 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32324                                  ulu_next:
 32325 00002CB6 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32326 00002CB9 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32327 00002CBB 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32328 00002CBD 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32329 00002CBF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32330 00002CC1 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32331                                  ulu_found:
 32332                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32333 00002CC3 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32334                                  ulu_x:
 32335 00002CC8 07                      	pop	es
 32336 00002CC9 1F                      	pop	ds
 32337 00002CCA C3                      	retn
