 35032                                  
 35033                                  show_status:
 35034                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35035                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35036                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35037                                          int     10h             ;
 35038                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35039                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35040                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35041                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35042                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35043                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35044                                          int     10h             ;
 35045                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35046                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35047                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35048                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35049                                  show_onoff: 
 35050                                          int     10h
 35051                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35052                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35053                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35054                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35055                                  
 35056                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35057                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35058                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35059                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35060                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35061                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35062                                          int     10h             ;
 35063                                  show_done:                      ;
 35064                                          pop     dx              ;
 35065                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35066                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35067                                          pop     bx              ;
 35068                                          retn			;
 35069                                  
 35070                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35071                                  
 35072                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35073                                  ;
 35074                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35075                                  ;
 35076                                  ;   INPUT
 35077                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35078                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35079                                  ;
 35080                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35081                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35082                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35083                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35084                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35085                                  ;
 35086                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35087                                  ;       AX
 35088                                  ;
 35089                                  ;   NOTES
 35090                                  ;       None
 35091                                  ;
 35092                                  ;   HISTORY
 35093                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35094                                  ;
 35095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35096                                  
 35097                                  skip_token:
 35098                                          call    get_char
 35099                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35100                                          call    any_delim
 35101                                          jne	short skip_token
 35102                                  skip_check_eol:
 35103                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35104                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35105                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35106                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35107                                          clc
 35108                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35109                                  	retn
 35110                                  skip_token_eol:
 35111                                          stc
 35112                                  skip_token_done:
 35113                                          retn
 35114                                  
 35115                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35116                                  ;
 35117                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35118                                  ;
 35119                                  ;   INPUT
 35120                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35121                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35122                                  ;
 35123                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35124                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35125                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35126                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35127                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35128                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35129                                  ;
 35130                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35131                                  ;       AX
 35132                                  ;
 35133                                  ;   NOTES
 35134                                  ;       None
 35135                                  ;
 35136                                  ;   HISTORY
 35137                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35138                                  ;
 35139                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35140                                  
 35141                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35142                                          call    get_char        ;
 35143                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35144                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35145                                          call    delim           ;
 35146                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35147                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35148                                  
 35149                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35150                                  ;
 35151                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35152                                  ;
 35153                                  ;   INPUT
 35154                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35155                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35156                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35157                                  ;
 35158                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35159                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35160                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35161                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35162                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35163                                  ;
 35164                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35165                                  ;       AX
 35166                                  ;
 35167                                  ;   NOTES
 35168                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35169                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35170                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35171                                  ;
 35172                                  ;   HISTORY
 35173                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35174                                  ;
 35175                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35176                                  
 35177                                  skip_opt_line:
 35178                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35179                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35180                                       
 35181                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35182                                  
 35183                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35184                                  ;
 35185                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35186                                  ;
 35187                                  ;   INPUT
 35188                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35189                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35190                                  ;
 35191                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35192                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35193                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35194                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35195                                  ;
 35196                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35197                                  ;       AX
 35198                                  ;
 35199                                  ;   NOTES
 35200                                  ;       None
 35201                                  ;
 35202                                  ;   HISTORY
 35203                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35204                                  ;
 35205                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35206                                  
 35207                                  skip_line:
 35208                                          call    get_char
 35209                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35210                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35211                                          jne	short skip_line
 35212                                  skip_line_done:
 35213                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35214                                          retn
 35215                                  
 35216                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35217                                  ;
 35218                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35219                                  ;
 35220                                  ;   INPUT
 35221                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35222                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35223                                  ;
 35224                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35225                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35226                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35227                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35228                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35229                                  ;
 35230                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35231                                  ;       AX
 35232                                  ;
 35233                                  ;   NOTES
 35234                                  ;       None
 35235                                  ;
 35236                                  ;   HISTORY
 35237                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35238                                  ;
 35239                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35240                                  
 35241                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35242                                  
 35243                                  get_number:
 35244                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35245                                  num_loop:
 35246                                          call    get_char        ;
 35247                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35248                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35249                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35250                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35251                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35252                                          push    ax              ;
 35253                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35254                                          push    dx              ;
 35255                                          mul     bx              ;
 35256                                          pop     dx              ;
 35257                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35258                                          pop     ax              ;
 35259                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35260                                          cbw                     ;
 35261                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35262                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35263                                  
 35264                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35265                                  ;num_done:
 35266                                          ;retn
 35267                                  
 35268                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35269                                  ;
 35270                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35271                                  ;
 35272                                  ;   INPUT
 35273                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35274                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35275                                  ;
 35276                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35277                                  ;       AL == next character
 35278                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35279                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35280                                  ;
 35281                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35282                                  ;       AX
 35283                                  ;
 35284                                  ;   NOTES
 35285                                  ;       None
 35286                                  ;
 35287                                  ;   HISTORY
 35288                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35289                                  ;
 35290                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35291                                  
 35292                                  get_char:
 35293                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35294                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35295                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35296                                  	es	
 35297                                  	lodsb
 35298                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35299                                          retn			;
 35300                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35301                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35302                                  nearby_ret:
 35303                                          retn
 35304                                  
 35305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35306                                  ;
 35307                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35308                                  ;
 35309                                  ;   INPUT
 35310                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35311                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35312                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35313                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35314                                  ;
 35315                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35316                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35317                                  ;
 35318                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35319                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35320                                  ;
 35321                                  ;   NOTES
 35322                                  ;       None
 35323                                  ;
 35324                                  ;   HISTORY
 35325                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35326                                  ;
 35327                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35328                                  
 35329                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35330                                  query_user:
 35331                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35332                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35333                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35334                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35335                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35336                                  qu_1:
 35337                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35338                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35339                                          push    ax                      ;
 35340                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35341                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35342                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35343                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35344                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35345                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35346                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35347                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35348                                  query_all:
 35349                                  
 35350                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35351                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35352                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35353                                  
 35354                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35355                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35356                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35357                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35358                                  
 35359                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35360                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35361                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35362                                  find_match:                             ;
 35363                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35364                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35365                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35366                                          inc     di                      ;
 35367                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35368                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35369                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35370                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35371                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35372                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35373                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35374                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35375                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35376                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35377                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35378                                          inc     di                      ;
 35379                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35380                                          int     21h                     ;
 35381                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35382                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35383                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35384                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35385                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35386                                  cmd_notset:
 35387                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35388                                  line_print:                             ;
 35389                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35390                                          es
 35391                                  	lodsb
 35392                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35393                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35394                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35395                                  non_null:                               ;
 35396                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35397                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35398                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35399                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35400                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35401                                  non_space:                              ;
 35402                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35403                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35404                                          int     21h                     ;
 35405                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35406                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35407                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35408                                  
 35409                                  generic_prompt:
 35410                                          call    print                   ;
 35411                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35412                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35413                                          int     16h                     ;
 35414                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35415                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35416                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35417                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35418                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35419                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35420                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35421                                  not_func:
 35422                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35423                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35424                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35425                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35426                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35427                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35428                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35429                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35430                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35431                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35432                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35433                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35434                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35435                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35436                                  
 35437                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35438                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35439                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35440                                  	clc
 35441                                  do_cmd:
 35442                                  	pop     ax			;
 35443                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35444                                  	; cf=0
 35445                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35446                                  	retn
 35447                                  
 35448                                  skip_cmd:
 35449                                  	pop     ax			;
 35450                                  skip_all:
 35451                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35452                                  	stc
 35453                                  	retn
 35454                                  
 35455                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35456                                  ;
 35457                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35458                                  ;
 35459                                  ;   INPUT
 35460                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35461                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35462                                  ;
 35463                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35464                                  ;       None
 35465                                  ;
 35466                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35467                                  ;       None
 35468                                  ;
 35469                                  ;   NOTES
 35470                                  ;       None
 35471                                  ;
 35472                                  ;   HISTORY
 35473                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35474                                  ;
 35475                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35476                                  
 35477                                  print_error:
 35478                                          push    ax
 35479                                          push    bx
 35480                                          push    cx
 35481                                          push    dx
 35482                                          push    ds
 35483                                          push    cs
 35484                                          pop     ds
 35485                                          pushf
 35486                                          call    get_linenum
 35487                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35488                                          call    error_line
 35489                                          popf
 35490                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35491                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35492                                          call    print
 35493                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35494                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35495                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35496                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35497                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35498                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35499                                  pe_1:     
 35500                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35501                                          call    print
 35502                                  pe_ret: 
 35503                                  	pop     ds
 35504                                          pop     dx
 35505                                          pop     cx
 35506                                          pop     bx
 35507                                          pop     ax
 35508                                  	retn
 35509                                  
 35510                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35511                                  
 35512                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35513                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35514                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35515                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35516                                  
 35517                                  disable_autoexec:
 35518                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35519                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35520                                  
 35521                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35522                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35523                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35524                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35525                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35526                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35527                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35528                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35529                                  dae_1:
 35530                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35531                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35532                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35533                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35534                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35535                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35536                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35537                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35538                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35539                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35540                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35541                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35542                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35543                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35544                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35545                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35546                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35547                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35548                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35549                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35550                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35551                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35552                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35553                                          retn
 35554                                  
 35555                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35556                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35557                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35558                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35559                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35560                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35561                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 35562                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35563                                  
 35564                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35565                                  
 35566                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35567

 35573                                  ; procedure : delim
 35574                                  ;
 35575                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35576                                  
 35577                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35578                                  ;
 35579                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35580                                  ;
 35581                                  ;any_delim:
 35582                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35583                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35584                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35585                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35586                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35587                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35588                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35589                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35590                                  ;
 35591                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35592                                  
 35593                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35594                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35595                                  delim:
 35596 00003085 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35597 00003087 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35598                                  
 35599 00003089 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35600 0000308B 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35601                                  
 35602                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35603 0000308D 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35604 0000308F 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35605 00003091 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35606 00003093 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35607 00003095 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35608 00003097 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35609 00003099 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35610 0000309B 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35611 0000309D 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35612                                  
 35613                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35614                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35615                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35616                                  ;	clc
 35617                                  ;;endif
 35618                                  
 35619                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35620                                  delim_ret:
 35621 0000309F C3                      	retn
 35622

 35635 000030A7 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35636 000030A9 E88FF6                  	call	getchr
 35637                                  nl_ret:

 35642                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35643                                  ;
 35644                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35645                                  
 35646                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35647                                  mapcase:
 35648 000030AD 51                      	push	cx
 35649 000030AE 56                      	push	si
 35650 000030AF 1E                      	push	ds
 35651                                  
 35652 000030B0 06                      	push	es
 35653 000030B1 1F                      	pop	ds
 35654                                  
 35655                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35656                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35657                                  ;
 35658                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35659                                  ;;else
 35660                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35661                                  ;;endif
 35662                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35663 000030B2 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35664                                  
 35665                                  convloop:
 35666 000030B4 AC                      	lodsb
 35667 000030B5 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35668 000030B7 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35669 000030B9 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35670 000030BB 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35671 000030BD 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35672 000030BF 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35673                                  noconv:
 35674                                  
 35675                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35676                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35677                                  ;;
 35678                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35679                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35680                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35681                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35682                                  ;;
 35683                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35684                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35685                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35686                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35687                                  ;check_eol:
 35688                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35689                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35690                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35691                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35692                                  ;;endif
 35693                                  	
 35694                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35695 000030C2 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35696                                  convdone:
 35697 000030C4 1F                      	pop	ds
 35698 000030C5 5E                      	pop	si
 35699 000030C6 59                      	pop	cx
 35700 000030C7 C3                      	retn

 35703                                  ;
 35704                                  ; procedure : round
 35705                                  ;
 35706                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35707                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35708                                  ;
 35709                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35710                                  
 35711                                  round:
 35712 000030C8 50                      	push	ax
 35713 000030C9 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35714                                  
 35715 000030CD E8F1DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35716                                  
 35717 000030D0 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35718 000030D5 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35719 000030DC 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35720 000030E0 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35721 000030E5 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35722 000030E7 2EF606[3614]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35723 000030ED 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35724 000030EF 06                      	push	es
 35725 000030F0 56                      	push	si
 35726 000030F1 2E8B36[3414]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35727 000030F6 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35728 000030F8 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35729 000030FA 48                      	dec	ax
 35730                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35731 000030FB 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35732 000030FF 2E8026[3614]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35733 00003105 5E                      	pop	si
 35734 00003106 07                      	pop	es
 35735                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35736 00003107 58                      	pop	ax
 35737                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35738                                  	; cf = 0
 35739                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35740                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35741 00003108 C3                      	retn
 35742                                  
 35743                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35744

 35751                                  	;push	cs
 35752                                  	;pop	ds
 35753 0000310E E87602                  	call	print
 35754 00003111 E940D7                  	jmp	stall

 35800                                  ;
 35801                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35802                                  ;
 35803                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35804                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35805                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35806                                  ;
 35807                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35808                                  
 35809                                  getnum:
 35810 0000313F 53                      	push	bx
 35811 00003140 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35812                                  b2:
 35813 00003142 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35814 00003145 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35815                                  
 35816 00003147 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35817 00003148 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35818                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35819                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35820 00003149 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35821 0000314B F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35822 0000314D 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35823 0000314E 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35824 00003150 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35825 00003153 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35826                                  
 35827 00003155 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35828                                  
 35829 00003156 E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35830 00003159 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35831 0000315B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35832 0000315D 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35833 0000315F 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35834 00003161 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35835 00003163 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35836 00003165 7417                    	je	short b15
 35837 00003167 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35838 0000316C 7410                    	je	short b15
 35839 0000316E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35840                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35841                                  	;nop
 35842                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35843                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35844                                  	;nop
 35845                                  	;nop
 35846 00003170 740C                    	je	short b15
 35847 00003172 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35848 00003174 7408                    	je	short b15
 35849 00003176 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35850 00003178 7404                    	je	short b15
 35851 0000317A 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35852 0000317C 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35853                                  b15:
 35854 0000317E 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35855 00003183 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35856                                  b1:
 35857 00003188 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35858 0000318A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35859 0000318C 5B                      	pop	bx
 35860 0000318D C3                      	retn
 35861                                  badnum:
 35862                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35863                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35864 0000318E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0

 35872                                  
 35873                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35874                                  
 35875                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35876                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35877                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35878                                  ;	si = 0
 35879                                  ;	ax = country id
 35880                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35881                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35882                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35883                                  ;
 35884                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35885                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35886                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35887                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35888                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35889                                  
 35890 00003197 57                      	push	di
 35891 00003198 50                      	push	ax
 35892 00003199 52                      	push	dx
 35893                                  
 35894 0000319A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 35895 0000319C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 35896 0000319E B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 35897 000031A1 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 35898 000031A4 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35899                                  
 35900 000031A6 06                      	push	es
 35901 000031A7 56                      	push	si
 35902                                  
 35903 000031A8 0E                      	push	cs
 35904 000031A9 07                      	pop	es
 35905                                  
 35906 000031AA BF[CB34]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 35907 000031AD B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 35908 000031B0 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 35909                                  
 35910 000031B2 5E                      	pop	si
 35911 000031B3 07                      	pop	es
 35912 000031B4 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 35913                                  
 35914 000031B6 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 35915 000031B9 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 35916 000031BC 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 35917                                  
 35918 000031BE 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 35919 000031BF 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 35920 000031C1 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 35921 000031C4 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 35922 000031C7 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 35923 000031CA 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35924                                  
 35925 000031CC 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 35926 000031CE 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 35927 000031D2 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35928                                  
 35929 000031D4 46                      	inc	si
 35930 000031D5 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 35931 000031D6 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 35932 000031D7 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 35933 000031D8 5F                      	pop	di
 35934                                  
 35935                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 35936 000031D9 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 35937 000031DC 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 35938                                  
 35939 000031DE 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 35940 000031E1 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 35941 000031E3 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 35942 000031E6 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 35943                                  
 35944                                  setdoscntry_next:
 35945 000031E8 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 35946 000031EA 46                      	inc	si
 35947 000031EB 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 35948 000031EC E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 35949                                  
 35950 000031EE B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 35951                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 35952 000031F1 F9                      	stc
 35953 000031F2 C3                      	retn
 35954                                  
 35955                                  setdosdata_fail:
 35956 000031F3 5E                      	pop	si
 35957 000031F4 59                      	pop	cx
 35958 000031F5 5F                      	pop	di
 35959 000031F6 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 35960                                  
 35961                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 35962 000031F8 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 35963                                  
 35964                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 35965 000031FB 2E8916[D334]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 35966 00003200 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 35967 00003203 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 35968 00003206 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 35969 00003209 E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 35970 0000320C 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 35971

 35973 00003210 46                      	inc	si
 35974 00003211 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 35975                                  
 35976                                  setdoscntry_data:
 35977 00003212 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 35978 00003213 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 35979 00003214 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer

 35982 00003218 E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di

 35987 00003223 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 35988 00003226 F9                      	stc
 35989 00003227 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 35990 00003229 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35991                                  
 35992 0000322B BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 35993 0000322E B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 35994 00003231 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 35995 00003233 F9                      	stc
 35996 00003234 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 35997 00003236 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 35998                                  
 35999 00003238 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36000 0000323A 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36001                                  
 36002 0000323C 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36003 0000323F 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]

 36005 00003245 F9                      	stc

 36007 00003248 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36008                                  
 36009 0000324A 56                      	push	si

 36011 0000324E 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36012 00003250 5E                      	pop	si

 36014 00003254 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36015 00003257 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36016 00003259 F9                      	stc
 36017 0000325A CD21                    	int	21h
 36018 0000325C 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36019                                  
 36020 0000325E 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36021 00003260 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36022                                  
 36023 00003262 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 36024 00003265 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36025 00003268 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36026 0000326A 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36027 0000326B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36028 0000326C 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36029 00003270 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36030

 36032 00003272 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 36033                                  	;endif

 36035 00003275 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36036 00003277 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36037                                  
 36038 00003279 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36039                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36040 0000327D 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36041                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36042

 36044                                  
 36045 00003282 50                      	push	ax

 36058 00003296 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]

 36106                                  
 36107                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36108                                  ;input: al - data id
 36109                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36110                                  ;on return:

 36112                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.

 36119 000032CC 47                      	inc	di

 36154                                  
 36155                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36156                                  
 36157                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36158                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36159                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36160                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36161                                  ;	 be moved.
 36162                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36163                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36164                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36165                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36166                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36167                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36168                                  
 36169 000032F3 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36170 000032F4 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36171 000032F7 F9                      	stc
 36172 000032F8 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36173 000032FA 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36174 000032FB 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36175                                  
 36176 000032FD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36177 000032FF 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36178 00003301 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36179 00003303 F9                      	stc
 36180 00003304 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36181                                  ricb_exit:
 36182 00003306 C3                      	retn

 36186                                  set_country_path:
 36187                                  
 36188                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36189                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36190                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36191                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36192                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36193                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36194

 36196

 36210                                  scp_default_drv:
 36211 00003317 B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36212 00003319 CD21                    	int	21h
 36213 0000331B 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36214                                  
 36215                                  scp_setdrv:
 36216 0000331D 2EA2[8834]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36217 00003321 BF[8B34]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36218 00003324 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36219 00003326 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36220 00003328 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36221                                  
 36222 0000332A 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36223 0000332C 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36224                                  
 36225 0000332E EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36226

 36229                                  scp_path:
 36230 00003331 E81F00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 36231                                  
 36232 00003334 BF[8834]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36233                                  scpath_exit:

 36235 00003337 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36236 00003338 06                      	push	es
 36237 00003339 1F                      	pop	ds
 36238 0000333A 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36239                                  
 36240 0000333B 5E                      	pop	si
 36241 0000333C C3                      	retn

 36248                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36249                                  ;carry set if not.
